<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

                            The fall cohort took home words of congratulation, wisdom and encouragement on November 21. Watch the videos.
                            <br/>
                            <a href="/news/stories/2013/11/26/-you-ll-always-beconcordiagraduates.html?utm_source=slide4&utm_medium=cqc-banner--you-ll-always-beconcordiagraduates&utm_campaign=homepagebanner" class="test">Read more...</a>
                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="item" style="background-image:url(/content/concordia/en/events/calendar/2013/12/13/contemporary-dancetheatreandmusicshows.banner.png/1385565241186.jpg)">
                    <div class="carousel-caption left">
                        <h4 class=" bg-orange">Contemporary dance, theatre and music shows</h4>
                        <p class="">
                            End-of-term works presented by performing arts students are open to the public.
                            <br/>
                            <a href="/events/calendar/2013/12/13/contemporary-dancetheatreandmusicshows.html?utm_source=slide5&utm_medium=cqc-banner-contemporary-dancetheatreandmusicshows&utm_campaign=homepagebanner" class="test">Read more...</a>
                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
            </div>
            
            <ol class="carousel-indicators">
                
                    <li data-target="#main-carousel" data-slide-to="0" data-content="<img src='/content/concordia/en/news/stories/2013/11/28/13-essential-tipsforexamsuccess.banner.png/1385739957961.jpg'>" title="13 essential tips for exam success" class="active"></li>
                
                    <li data-target="#main-carousel" data-slide-to="1" data-content="<img src='/content/concordia/en/alumni-friends/news/announcements/2013/11/28/concordia-honours-literary-icon.banner.png/1385673078092.jpg'>" title="Concordia honours literary icon" class=""></li>
                
                    <li data-target="#main-carousel" data-slide-to="2" data-content="<img src='/content/concordia/en/news/stories/2013/11/27/epearl-of-wisdom.banner.png/1385579227389.jpg'>" title="e-PEARL of wisdom" class=""></li>
                
                    <li data-target="#main-carousel" data-slide-to="3" data-content="<img src='/content/concordia/en/news/stories/2013/11/26/-you-ll-always-beconcordiagraduates.banner.png/1385753123249.jpg'>" title="Convocation 2013:<br>&lsquo;You'll always be Concordia graduates&rsquo;" class=""></li>
                
                    <li data-target="#main-carousel" data-slide-to="4" data-content="<img src='/content/concordia/en/events/calendar/2013/12/13/contemporary-dancetheatreandmusicshows.banner.png/1385565241186.jpg'>" title="Contemporary dance, theatre and music shows" class=""></li>
                
                <li class="c_controls pause" title=""><a href="#" title="Play / Pause">Play / Pause</a></li>
            </ol>
            <a class="left carousel-control" href="#main-carousel" data-slide="prev">&lsaquo;</a>
            <a class="right carousel-control" href="#main-carousel" data-slide="next">&rsaquo;</a>
            
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
			jQuery(document).ready(function() {
                var c_carousel = jQuery('.carousel');

				// Instantiate the carousel
			    c_carousel.carousel({ interval: 7000, pause:'hover' });

                jQuery('.c_controls a').bind('click touch', function(e) {
                    $parent = jQuery(this).parent();
                    if ($parent.hasClass('play')) { // We need to play
                        c_carousel.carousel('cycle');
                        $parent.removeClass('play').addClass('pause');
            
                    } else { // We need to pause
                        c_carousel.carousel('pause');
                        $parent.removeClass('pause').addClass('play');
                    }
            
                    e.preventDefault();
                });

                // Instantiate the popovers.
                jQuery('.carousel-indicators li').popover({ trigger: "hover", placement: "top", html: "true" });
                jQuery('.carousel-indicators li:not(.c_controls)').bind('click touch', function(){ c_carousel.carousel('pause'); });
            
                // hide center blurbs when pop-overs are activated
                jQuery('.carousel-indicators li:not(.c_controls)').hover(
                    function(e) {
                        jQuery('.carousel-inner .item.active p').stop().fadeOut('fast');
                    },
                    function(e) {
                        jQuery('.carousel-inner .item.active p').stop().fadeIn('slow');
                    }	    
                );
			});
	   </script>

        
</div>

        jQuery(function() {  
            $ = jQuery;
            $(document).on("click", ".c-vignette", function(){
                var datahref = jQuery(this).attr('data-href');
                if(datahref) window.location = datahref;
            });
            $(document).on("click", ".c-vignette a.btn", function() {
                event.stopPropagation();
            });
        });
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	
	jQuery(window).load( function() {
		$ = jQuery;
        var w = $('.c-news-grid .media-object').width();
        var h = 0.8 * w;

		$('.c-news-grid img.media-object').css('max-width','none').resizecrop({ width:w , height:h });
        $('.c-news-grid div.media-object').css('width', w + 'px').css('height',h+'px');
    });

</script></div>

<h2 class="section-header"><a name="newsletter">E-Newsletter sign up</a></h2>

<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-bottom-parsys-social_media-parsys-tabs-0-wysiwyg_0';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-bottom-parsys-social_media-parsys-tabs-0-wysiwyg_0';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/jcr:content/bottom-parsys/social_media/parsys-tabs-0/wysiwyg_0';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/jcr:content/bottom-parsys/social_media/parsys-tabs-4/image");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "http://www.flickr.com/photos/concordiauniversity/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/images/social-media/Flickr_Concordia@220x220-20131126.jpg", imageTitle: "Concordia\x20Flickr" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>

        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/concordiauniversity/" target="_blank">Find Concordia on Flickr</a></p>

</div></div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Undergraduate Calendar<br />
2013-2014</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase image section"><div id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="Undergraduate Calendar 2013-2014" alt="Undergraduate Calendar 2013-2014" class="cq-dd-image" src="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1384882573860.jpg"></div>
    
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/jcr:content/content-main/image");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/images/calendar/cover13-14.jpg", imageTitle: "Undergraduate\x20Calendar\x202013\x2D2014" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/pubinfo.html">Publication Information</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/mission.html">Mission, Vision, Values<br>
 <br>
 </a></li>
<li><b><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/contents.html">TABLE OF CONTENTS<br>
 <br>
 </a></b></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/about.html">About the University</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/nomen.html">Gender Neutral Degree Nomenclature</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec11.html">Academic Calendar</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec13.html">Admission Regulations</a><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec11.html"><br>
 <br>
 </a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec31.html">Arts and Science</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec61.html">John Molson School of Business</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec71.html">Engineering and Computer Science</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec81.html">Fine Arts</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="640" border="0">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top" width="100%"><table border="0" width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tbody><tr><td width="100%"><p>The&nbsp;Undergraduate Calendar&nbsp;is also available in Adobe's Portable Document Format (PDF):<br>
<b><a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/calendar/UGCalendar13-14.pdf">Undergraduate Calendar 2013-14</a></b></p>
<p><b>Please note that the online version of the Undergraduate Calendar&nbsp;is up to date as of February 2013.</b></p>
<p><b>The online Calendar is an official University document.</b>&nbsp;It defines academic programs and the regulations that pertain to them. The University Senate reserves the right to modify the academic programs and regulations at its discretion after the posting date of the Calendar. In addition, the University reserves the right to modify the posted scale of tuition and other student fees and to limit the number of students who enrol in any program or course at any time before the beginning of an academic term. Moreover, the information contained in the Undergraduate Calendar or any other University document related to academic programs, deadlines, and regulations is subject to verification and correction by the Office of the Registrar and the School of Graduate Studies.</p>
<p>Not all courses listed in this Calendar are offered this year. Students are advised to consult the&nbsp;<a href="http://fcms.concordia.ca/fcms/asc002_stud_all.aspx">Undergraduate Class Schedule</a>&nbsp;for a timetable of courses offered.</p>
<p>Please note that the Undergraduate Calendar is available solely online and constitutes the official Undergraduate Calendar of the University. The most recent version of the Calendar is the only version currently in effect. Students are responsible for ensuring that graduation requirements are met, in accordance with the requirements set out in the Calendar corresponding to the year of admission, except for Engineering programs. Students in the Engineering programs are required to graduate having met the substantial equivalent of the curriculum in force in the winter term prior to degree conferral. Archived Calendars may be consulted using the &quot;Archived Calendars&quot; link.</p>
<p>This Calendar is intended to assist readers to understand the academic and administrative structure and policies and procedures of the University, and to describe the academic programs offered. The material has been submitted by academic units and administrative departments. Every effort has been made to ensure that all general information and course references are accurate as of the date of posting, but these are subject to possible verification and correction. By the act of registration each student becomes bound by the policies and regulations of Concordia University, including the Faculty in which the student is registered. Students are responsible for familiarizing themselves with the general information, rules and regulations contained in the Calendar, and with the specific information, rules and regulations of the Faculty or Faculties in which they are registered or enrolled or seek registration or enrolment, as well as the specific requirements of each degree or certificate sought. It is the student’s responsibility to ensure that the courses chosen are appropriate to the program requirements.</p>
<p>Concordia University disclaims all responsibility and liability for loss or damage suffered or incurred by any student or other party as a result of delays in or termination of its services, courses, or classes by reason of force majeure, including fire, flood, riots, war, strikes, lock‑outs, damage to University property, financial exigency and/or other events beyond the reasonable control of the University. Concordia University disclaims any and all liability for damages arising as a result of errors, interruptions or disruptions to operations or connected with its operations or its campuses, arising out of computer failure or non‑compliance of its computing systems.</p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<p><a href="http://concordia.ca/"><img src="http://registrar.concordia.ca/calendar/conlogo.gif" alt="Concordia University - Montreal, Quebec, Canada"></a><br>
Last Modified April, 2013<br>
Enrolment Services</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>

                <div class="parsys sidebar">

        </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-events-academic-dates-content-main-external';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-events-academic-dates-content-main-external';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/events/academic-dates/jcr:content/content-main/external';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>

                                       <ul>
                                               <li><a tabindex="-1" href="http://international.concordia.ca/">Concordia International</a></li>
                                               <li><a tabindex="-1" href="http://supportservices.concordia.ca/iso/">International Students Office</a></li>
                                               <li><a tabindex="-1" href="/alumni-friends/alumni-network/international-chapters.html">Global alumni</a></li>
                                          </ul>
                               	  </div>
                                  <div class="view-all">
                                      <a href="/international.html">Overview of <span>International</span></a>
                               	  </div>
                              </div>
                         </li>
                     </ul>
                </div>
            </div>    
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Fall 2013 Graduate Calendar</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b><a name="page"></a>The Calendar is an official University document defining academic programs and regulations. It is accurate as of August&nbsp;1,&nbsp;2013&nbsp;<a href="#footnote">*</a>. It includes all items approved at Senate up until April 19, 2013.</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>General Information</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/the-university.html" adhocenable="false">University Overview</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/academic-calendar.html" adhocenable="false">Academic Calendar</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/academic-regulations.html" adhocenable="false">Academic Regulations</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/graduate-admission.html" adhocenable="false">Admission</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/graduate-awards.html" adhocenable="false">Awards</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/graduate-registration.html" adhocenable="false">Classification of Students and Registration</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/international-program.html" adhocenable="false">International Program</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/international-students.html" adhocenable="false">International Students</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/policies-procedures.html" adhocenable="false">Policies and Procedures</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/postdoctoral-fellows.html" adhocenable="false">Postdoctoral Fellows</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/student-services.html" adhocenable="false">Student Services</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/thesis-regulations.html" adhocenable="false">Thesis Regulations</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2><a name="fasc"></a>
Faculty of Arts and Science</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/fasc/ahsc.html" adhocenable="false">Applied Human Sciences</a></li>

<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/fasc/engl.html" adhocenable="false">English</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/fasc/fran.html" adhocenable="false">Études françaises</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/fasc/exci.html" adhocenable="false">Exercise Science</a></li>

<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/fasc/phil.html" adhocenable="false">Philosophy</a></li>

<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/fasc/psyc.html" adhocenable="false">Psychology</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/fasc/reli.html" adhocenable="false">Religion</a></li>

</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2><a name="jmsb"></a>
John Molson School of Business</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/jmsb/busiadmi.html">Business Administration</a></li>

<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2><a name="sgs"></a>
School of Graduate Studies</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/sgs/indi.html" adhocenable="false">Individualized Program (INDI)</a></li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="footnote"></a>* The University Senate reserves the right to modify the academic programs and regulations at its discretion after the posting date of the Calendar. In addition, the University reserves the right to modify the published scale of tuition and other student fees at any time before the beginning of an academic term. The most current information is available from the School of Graduate Studies. Moreover, the information contained in the Calendar or any other University document related to academic programs and regulations is subject to verification and correction by the School of Graduate Studies.</p>
<p><a href="#page">Top</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>Application Deadlines</h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Application deadlines vary and depend upon the&nbsp;program. You must complete admission files by the deadline indicated. In most cases, however, international applicants must arrange for all required documentation to be in the appropriate office at least six months before the commencement of classes.</p>
<p><a href="http://www.concordia.ca/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/GradAppDeadlines.pdf" adhocenable="false">Download a full list of application deadlines</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    <a href="#" title="Twitter" class="st_twitter_custom">
                    	<span class="sprites-icon-social-2" displayText="Twitter" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar.img.png/1384384377879.png'>Twitter</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="LinkedIn" class="st_linkedin_custom">
                        <span class="sprites-icon-social-5" displayText="LinkedIn" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar.img.png/1384384377879.png'>LinkedIn</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>   
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();
                jQuery(window).scroll(function(){
                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


	        <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Undergraduate Calendar</H1>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="2013-2014 Undergraduate Calendar" alt="2013-2014 Undergraduate Calendar" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1384904100288.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/images/calendar/cover13-14.jpg", imageTitle: "2013\x2D2014\x20Undergraduate\x20Calendar" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><h3>2013-2014 Undergraduate Calendar</h3>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current.html" target="_self">View the current course calendar &rarr;</a>

</div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/pdf.html" target="_self">Download sections of the Course Calendar (PDF)</a>

</div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/calendar/UGCalendar13-14.pdf" target="_self">Download the entire course calendar (PDF)</a>

</div>
<div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark with-border" style="background-color: #F0F0F0 !important;  color: # !important;   padding: 10px; 10px; 10px; 10px; ;">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Please note that the online version&nbsp;of the Undergraduate Calendar is up&nbsp;to date as of February 2013.</b></p>

</div></div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><b>Archived calendars</b></h3>
<p>Previous online Undergraduate Calendars</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt5"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt5-c0 span3"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2012-13.html">2012-2013</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2011-12.html">2011-2012</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2010-11.html">2010-2011</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt5-c1 span3"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><a href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2009-10.html" adhocenable="false">2009-2010</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2008-09.html" adhocenable="false">2008-2009</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt5-c2 span3"></div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt5-c3 span3"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>The online Calendar is an official University document.</b>&nbsp;It defines academic programs and the regulations that pertain to them. The University Senate reserves the right to modify the academic programs and regulations at its discretion after the posting date of the Calendar. In addition, the University reserves the right to modify the posted scale of tuition and other student fees and to limit the number of students who enrol in any program or course at any time before the beginning of an academic term. Moreover, the information contained in the Undergraduate Calendar or any other University document related to academic programs, deadlines, and regulations is subject to verification and correction by the Office of the Registrar and the School of Graduate Studies.</p>
<p>Not all courses listed in this Calendar are offered this year. Students are advised to consult the&nbsp;<a href="http://fcms.concordia.ca/fcms/asc002_stud_all.aspx">Undergraduate Class Schedule</a>&nbsp;for a timetable of courses offered.</p>
<p>Please note that the Undergraduate Calendar is available solely online and constitutes the official Undergraduate Calendar of the University. The most recent version of the Calendar is the only version currently in effect. Students are responsible for ensuring that graduation requirements are met, in accordance with the requirements set out in the Calendar corresponding to the year of admission, except for Engineering programs. Students in the Engineering programs are required to graduate having met the substantial equivalent of the curriculum in force in the winter term prior to degree conferral. Archived Calendars may be consulted using the &quot;Archived Calendars&quot; link.</p>
<p>This Calendar is intended to assist readers to understand the academic and administrative structure and policies and procedures of the University, and to describe the academic programs offered. The material has been submitted by academic units and administrative departments. Every effort has been made to ensure that all general information and course references are accurate as of the date of posting, but these are subject to possible verification and correction. By the act of registration each student becomes bound by the policies and regulations of Concordia University, including the Faculty in which the student is registered. Students are responsible for familiarizing themselves with the general information, rules and regulations contained in the Calendar, and with the specific information, rules and regulations of the Faculty or Faculties in which they are registered or enrolled or seek registration or enrolment, as well as the specific requirements of each degree or certificate sought. It is the student’s responsibility to ensure that the courses chosen are appropriate to the program requirements.</p>
<p>Concordia University disclaims all responsibility and liability for loss or damage suffered or incurred by any student or other party as a result of delays in or termination of its services, courses, or classes by reason of force majeure, including fire, flood, riots, war, strikes, lock‑outs, damage to University property, financial exigency and/or other events beyond the reasonable control of the University. Concordia University disclaims any and all liability for damages arising as a result of errors, interruptions or disruptions to operations or connected with its operations or its campuses, arising out of computer failure or non‑compliance of its computing systems.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

        </div>
    </div>

</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    <a href="#" title="Facebook" class="st_facebook_custom">

<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Graduate Calendar</h1>
</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current.html"><h2>Fall 2013 Graduate Calendar</h2></a>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current.html" target="_self">See Fall 2013 Graduate Calendar</a>

</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>About the Calendar</h3>
<p>The Calendar is an official University document defining academic programs and the regulations which pertain to them. It is accurate as of August 1, 2013. The University Senate reserves the right to modify the academic programs and regulations at its discretion after the posting date of the Calendar. In addition, the University reserves the right to modify the published scale of tuition and other student fees at any time before the beginning of an academic term. The most current information is available from the School of Graduate Studies. Moreover, the information contained in the Calendar or any other University document related to academic programs and regulations is subject to verification and correction by the School of Graduate Studies.</p>
<p>The School of Graduate Studies is located at 2145 Mackay.<br>
Office hours are Monday to Friday 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.</p>
<p><b>Telephone:</b> 514-848-2424 ext.3800<br>
<b>Fax Number:</b> 514-848-2812<br>
<b>Web address:</b> <a href="/offices/sgs.html" adhocenable="false">concordia.ca/offices/sgs</a></p>
<p>Communication of Information to Provincial Ministry of Education:<br>
Under the terms of an agreement between Concordia University and the provincial Ministry of Education, approved by the Québec Access to Information Commission, Concordia University is required to transmit to the Ministry some or all of the following information concerning its students: the student’s permanent code, complete name, date of birth, gender, father’s complete name, mother’s complete name and place of birth. This information is being transmitted, at the Ministry’s request, in order to provide the Ministry with the tools to properly calculate funding for Concordia University, for planning purposes and to ensure the proper management of public funds.</p>
<p>Produced by the School of Graduate Studies<br>
Web Editor: A. Rico</p>
<p>Copyright Concordia University</p>
<p>Posted: August 1, 2013</p>

					<span class="sprites-icon-home">Home</span>

            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
                    <a href="/hospitality/event-logistics.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Event logistics</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">

                    <a href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Venues</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">

	</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    Home
                </a>
	        </li>

                    Hospitality Concordia

                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">

</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Hospitality Concordia welcomes both the university community and the general public. We look after the big picture or the little details, whether it’s for day-to-day tasks like parking the car, or a special event. We make campus life a little simpler so that you can enjoy a seamless university experience.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">What we offer</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Whether you’re a student who needs a meal plan, a staff member planning a banquet, or a member of the general public organizing a conference, Hospitality Concordia is at your service.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">

<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark with-border" style=" color: # !important;   padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px;">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '>Community Holiday Lunches </h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase image section"><div id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/jcr:content/sidebar/box_0/box-parsys/image"><img title="Holiday Photo" alt="Holiday Photo" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/hospitality/_jcr_content/sidebar/box_0/box-parsys/image.img.png/1385497885016.png"></div>
    
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/jcr:content/sidebar/box_0/box-parsys/image");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/Holiday Photo.png", imageTitle: "Holiday\x20Photo" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Good food, good price... enjoy a Holiday Lunch with all the trimmings!</h3>
<h4><b>December 10th&nbsp; - Loyola &nbsp;</b></h4>
<h5><b>Jesuit Hall &amp; Conference Centre, 11:30 a.m. - 2:00 p.m.</b></h5>
<h4><b>December 12th - SGW &nbsp;</b></h4>
<h5><b>McConnell Library Building Atrium,&nbsp; 11:30 a.m. - 2:00 p.m.</b></h5>
<p style="text-align: center;"><b><a target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/food-beverages/Community%20Holiday%20Lunch%20Menu.pdf" adhocenable="false">View the menu</a></b></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><b><a adhocenable="false" href="/hospitality/contact/rsvp-form.html">RSVP before December 6th</a> and your name will be entered in a prize draw!</b><br>
</p>
<h4 style="text-align: center;"><b>$8 tax incl.</b></h4>
<h3 style="text-align: center;">All are welcome!</h3>

</div></div>


</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

<h1>Current PDF</h1>

<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/pdf/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="Concordia Undergraduate Calendar 2013-14" alt="Concordia Undergraduate Calendar 2013-14" class="cq-dd-image" src="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/pdf/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1384557431429.jpg"></div>

    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/pdf/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/images/calendar/cover13-14.jpg", imageTitle: "Concordia\x20Undergraduate\x20Calendar\x202013\x2D14" }';

            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();

        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><h4><br>
<br>
2013-2014<br>
Undergraduate Calendar</h4>
<p><br>
You may download the entire Undergraduate Calendar<br>
as one file:&nbsp;<b><a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/calendar/UGCalendar13-14.pdf" adhocenable="false">UGCalendar13-14</a></b>*</p>
<p>OR download&nbsp;individual PDF sections&nbsp;<b>below</b>.<br>
&nbsp;</p>
<p><b>*Please note that PDF version&nbsp;of the Undergraduate Calendar is up&nbsp;to date as of February 2013.</b></p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Undergraduate Calendar</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>2012-2013</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2012-13/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="Concordia Undergraduate Calendar 2012-13" alt="Concordia Undergraduate Calendar 2012-13" class="cq-dd-image" src="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2012-13/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1384557467264.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2012-13/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/images/calendar/cover12-13.jpg", imageTitle: "Concordia\x20Undergraduate\x20Calendar\x202012\x2D13" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><h4><br>
<br>
2012-2013<br>
Undergraduate Calendar</h4>
<p><br>
You may download the entire Undergraduate Calendar<br>
as one file:&nbsp;<b><a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/calendar/12-13/UGCalendar12-13.pdf">UGCalendar12-13</a>*</b></p>
<p>OR download&nbsp;individual PDF sections&nbsp;<b>below</b>.<br>
<br>
</p>
<p><b>*Please note that PDF version&nbsp;of the Undergraduate Calendar is up&nbsp;to date as of March 2012.</b></p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">

</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Hospitality Concordia welcomes both the university community and the general public. We look after the big picture or the little details, whether it’s for day-to-day tasks like parking the car, or a special event. We make campus life a little simpler so that you can enjoy a seamless university experience.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">What we offer</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Whether you’re a student who needs a meal plan, a staff member planning a banquet, or a member of the general public organizing a conference, Hospitality Concordia is at your service.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>

<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark with-border" style=" color: # !important;   padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px;">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '>Community Holiday Lunches </h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase image section"><div id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/jcr:content/sidebar/box_0/box-parsys/image"><img title="Holiday Photo" alt="Holiday Photo" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/hospitality/_jcr_content/sidebar/box_0/box-parsys/image.img.png/1385497885016.png"></div>
    
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/jcr:content/sidebar/box_0/box-parsys/image");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/Holiday Photo.png", imageTitle: "Holiday\x20Photo" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Good food, good price... enjoy a Holiday Lunch with all the trimmings!</h3>
<h4><b>December 10th&nbsp; - Loyola &nbsp;</b></h4>
<h5><b>Jesuit Hall &amp; Conference Centre, 11:30 a.m. - 2:00 p.m.</b></h5>
<h4><b>December 12th - SGW &nbsp;</b></h4>
<h5><b>McConnell Library Building Atrium,&nbsp; 11:30 a.m. - 2:00 p.m.</b></h5>
<p style="text-align: center;"><b><a target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/food-beverages/Community%20Holiday%20Lunch%20Menu.pdf" adhocenable="false">View the menu</a></b></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><b><a adhocenable="false" href="/hospitality/contact/rsvp-form.html">RSVP before December 6th</a> and your name will be entered in a prize draw!</b><br>
</p>
<h4 style="text-align: center;"><b>$8 tax incl.</b></h4>
<h3 style="text-align: center;">All are welcome!</h3>

</div></div>


</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="c-intro row">
    <h1 class="span8 section-header">School of Graduate Studies</h1>

    
    <div class="span8">
        <p>We guide students, faculty and administrators through the academic and administrative components of Concordia’s graduate programs.&nbsp;</p>

    </div>
	<div class="span4">
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/offices/sgs/services/deans-message.html">
                    
                    Read the Dean's message
                    </a>
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/offices/sgs/contact.html">
                    
                    Contact us
                    </a></div>
</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/offices/sgs/jcr:content/content-main/image");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/offices/sgs/images/graduate-studies-workshops.jpg", imageTitle: "graduate\x2Dstudies\x2Dworkshops" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Dean's message</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/offices/sgs/services/deans-message/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="Dr. Paula Wood-Adams, Dean of Graduate Studies" alt="Dr. Paula Wood-Adams, Dean of Graduate Studies" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/offices/sgs/services/deans-message/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1384802085758.jpg"><small>Dr. Paula Wood-Adams,<br>Dean of Graduate Studies</small></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/offices/sgs/services/deans-message/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/offices/sgs/images/Paula_Wood-Adams.jpg", imageTitle: "Dr.\x20Paula\x20Wood\x2DAdams,\x20Dean\x20of\x20Graduate\x20Studies" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p>Whether you’re currently registered as a graduate student or postdoctoral fellow at Concordia, have applied to one of our programs, or would simply like to know more about the possibilities for advanced degree work and training in the more than 100 programs we offer in fine arts, the humanities, social, life and natural sciences, business, engineering or computer science, welcome to Concordia University.</p>
<p>With more than 6000 graduate students and postdoctoral fellows from over 150 countries, Concordia University embodies the vibrancy and cosmopolitanism of Montréal, a city that is known as a hub for research, learning and innovation.</p>
<p>We offer our students a wide range of flourishing research programs at the Master’s and PhD levels, as well as professional training and accreditation in course-based Master’s, Diploma and Certificate programs. Home to several unique niche programs, Concordia is also known as a leader for its commitment to interdisciplinary graduate studies and support for inter-university programs that expand the range of choices available to our students.</p>
<p>For postdoctoral fellows and research-oriented graduate students, much of what differentiates Concordia is captured by our&nbsp;<a href="http://vprgs.concordia.ca/programsandpolicies/researchstrategicplan/" adhocenable="false">University’s Strategic Research Plan</a>, which places a high premium on the value of advanced training and identifies the major clusters of expertise for which Concordia is recognized nationally and internationally. Similarly, the impressive track record of graduates from our various professional programs demonstrates the relevance, marketability and value of Concordia’s degree-offerings in the highly competitive knowledge and technology economies of the 21st century.</p>
<p>Why is Concordia such a dynamic place for graduate and postdoctoral studies? The answer begins with people. The University is justifiably proud of our impressive roster of senior faculty, many of whom are established leaders in their respective academic fields. But the vitality of Concordia is also reflected by the reality, quite unique in North America, that more than half of our full-time tenured and tenure-track faculty have been hired in the last ten years. Similarly, we take great pride in the innovative work of our graduate students and postdoctoral fellows, and actively support both their quest for knowledge, and their desire to transmit and apply their skills for the benefit of society.</p>
<p>Our graduate students and postdoctoral fellows also benefit from the striking investments that we have recently made, and continue to make in new buildings, state-of –the art labs, experimental exhibition spaces, smart classrooms, office and meeting spaces. The contemporary design of our research and teaching spaces is an integral expression of our commitment to creating a physical environment that can sustain the production of learning and knowledge in the 21st century.</p>
<p>So I encourage you to take this opportunity to further explore what Concordia can offer in your pursuit of graduate study and postdoctoral training. Together with the superb professional staff of the School of Graduate Studies I and my team of associate deans are eager to answer your questions about Concordia or to refer you directly to the Graduate Program Directors in your chosen field of study. We look forward to hearing from you and to working closely with you to achieve success and develop your academic and professional potential to the fullest.</p>
<p>Paula Wood-Adams<br>
Dean of Graduate Studies</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

    });

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Contact us</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">

Advisor, External Awards</td>
<td>Student and faculty liaison for all federal and provincial external agency awards (i.e. SSHRC, NSERC, FRQSC, FRQNT, etc…), as well as conference, special entrance, and thesis completion awards</td>
</tr><tr><td><a href="http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/directories.html?f=search&amp;fname=Margaret&amp;lname=Lawrence">Margaret Lawrence</a>,<br>
Advisor, Internal Awards</td>
<td>Student and faculty liaison for all internal awards (i.e. advancement awards etc…)</td>
</tr><tr><td><a href="http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/directories.html?f=search&amp;fname=Daniela&amp;lname=Del">Daniela Del Balso</a>,<br>
Awards Assistant</td>
<td>Responds to all front-line awards questions, updates directory and database, verifies registrations for payment processing</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines table-striped">
    <table>
<tbody><tr><th colspan="2"><a name="gradproskills"></a>Graduate and Professional Skills</th>
</tr><tr><td width="40%"><a href="http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/directories.html?f=search&amp;fname=Laurie&amp;lname=Lamoureux">Laurie Lamoureux-Scholes</a>,<br>
Director, Graduate and Professional Skills Development Program</td>
<td>Oversees GradProSkills Program, policies and procedures, liases with all providers</td>
</tr><tr><td><a href="http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/directories.html?f=search&amp;fname=Cristina&amp;lname=Barbu">Cristina Barbu</a>,<br>
Administrative Assistant</td>
<td>Responds to all inquires, schedules meetings and workshops, manages the database</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');

    });

				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/academic-resources/transcripts-redirect.html">Transcripts</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown active">
					
                    <a href="/students/financial-support.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Financial matters</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/costs-budgeting-redirect.html">Costs &amp; budgeting</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/government-loans.html">Government student aid</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/bursaries.html">Bursaries</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/work-study.html">Work-study program</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/scholarships-awards.html">Undergraduate awards</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="active">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/graduate-funding.html">Graduate awards</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
						<a href="/students/campus-services.html" role="button">Campus services</a>
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
						<a href="/students/beyond-the-classroom.html" role="button">Beyond the classroom</a>
	            </li>
        </ul>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">
