<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">    
        





<div class="breadcrumb breadcrumbs">



<ul class="c-breadcrumb breadcrumb">

	        <li>
                <a href="/" onclick="CQ_Analytics.record({event:'followBreadcrumb',values: { breadcrumbPath: '/content/concordia/en' },collect: false,options: { obj: this },componentPath: 'concordia/components/breadcrumb'})">
                    Home
                </a>
	        </li>
	        &nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;
	        <li>
                <a href="/offices.html" onclick="CQ_Analytics.record({event:'followBreadcrumb',values: { breadcrumbPath: '/content/concordia/en/offices' },collect: false,options: { obj: this },componentPath: 'concordia/components/breadcrumb'})">
                    Offices
                </a>
	        </li>

	        <li>

                    School of Graduate Studies
                </a>
	        </li>

                </a>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Individualized program</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h3>Degrees offered</h3>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/offices/sgs/individualized/program-requirements.html#ma">MA</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/offices/sgs/individualized/program-requirements.html#ma">MSc</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/offices/sgs/individualized/program-requirements.html#phd">PhD</a></li>
</ul>
<p>Think outside the box. Create new syntheses of knowledge and creation. These are the hallmarks of the Individualized Program (INDI). Many stellar researchers at Concordia are prepared to help you navigate new terrains of scholarship. We offer a heterogeneous community of over 100 like-minded students to welcome you into their fold.</p>
<p>INDI was created by the&nbsp;School of Graduate Studies&nbsp;to provide space within the academy for a <b>limited number of exceptionally capable and prepared students</b> with specific research goals. An individualized program of study, INDI offers the possibility for research and graduate studies at both the <b>master’s and doctoral levels </b>in areas not covered by existing graduate programs.</p>
<ul>
<li>INDI is designed to promote <b>innovative approaches to issues </b>outside the normal boundaries of research and creation of existing graduate programs&nbsp;</li>
<li>INDI students engage in <b>individualized research initiatives </b>supported by integrated programs of study drawing on the various resources available both within and across Faculties at Concordia University.</li>
<li>In most cases, if you apply to INDI, you must propose a program involving<b> multi- or interdisciplinary scholarship</b> on problems that are not normally the province of disciplinary programs at Concordia.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Contact Us</h2>
<ul>
<li><a href="/offices/sgs/individualized/contact.html" adhocenable="false">Individualized Programs</a></li>
<li><a href="/offices/sgs/contact.html" adhocenable="false">School of Graduate Studies</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/offices/sgs/individualized.html'>Individualized program</a><div class='arrow open'><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/sgs/individualized/admission-requirements.html'>Admission requirements</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/sgs/individualized/program-requirements.html'>Program requirements</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/sgs/individualized/program-requirements/supervisory-committee.html'>Supervisory committee</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/sgs/individualized/research-currents.html'>Research currents</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/sgs/individualized/news.html'>News & events</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/sgs/individualized/news/archives.html'>Archives</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/sgs/individualized/theses-working-titles.html'>Theses working titles</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/sgs/individualized/courses-of-interest.html'>Courses of interest</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/sgs/individualized/about.html'>Program Directory & Committee</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/sgs/individualized/contact.html'>Contact</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>

        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="parsys program-details">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>Why pursue a Graduate Certificate in University Teaching?</h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Graduate Certificate in University Teaching is a 15-credit program designed for current doctoral candidates at Concordia University.&nbsp; The aim of the program is for learners to gain in-depth knowledge about pedagogical practices in post-secondary education and to develop teaching skills in delivering a university course within their area of expertise. Benefiting from the mentorship of experts in university pedagogy and a discipline-specific faculty member, admitted candidates will expand their knowledge about theories of learning and instructional design, as well as enhance their skills in analyzing literature relevant to teaching and learning in higher education. &nbsp;Candidates will also learn to identify appropriate educational resources relevant to their disciplines and make appropriate planning, design and classroom management decisions. All candidates will be required to apply the knowledge and skills acquired to the design, delivery and evaluation of a 3-credit university course.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Why study at Concordia?">
					
                    Why study at Concordia?
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Graduate Certificate in University Teaching offers a competitive edge to Concordia PhD candidates seeking a tenure-track position. It provides these candidates an opportunity to gain in-depth knowledge and skills related to university teaching by engaging in an interdisciplinary program of study. Concordia’s Graduate Certificate is grounded in an apprenticeship model through which students are partnered with discipline-specific faculty members, teaching fellows from Concordia’s four faculties as well as teaching and learning consultants. Finally, the capstone requirement to design, develop, implement and evaluate a full 3-credit university course provides invaluable teaching experience within the student’s area of specialization.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>Program Details</h4>
</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item open">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Degree options">
					
                    Degree options
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: block;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<div>Graduate Certificate</div>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item open">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Sample classes">
					
                    Sample classes
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: block;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>ETEC 613 Learning Theories (3 credits)<br>
This course examines the processes of specifying and producing environmental conditions for observing and promoting changes in the student. Its focus is the study of the learning process. The student is expected to develop a general understanding of the major theoretical and practical approaches to the study of learning and to begin to develop competence in selected aspects of the area.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li>UNIT 601 Teaching and Learning in Higher Education (3 credits)<br>
This seminar course is designed as a survey at an advanced level of the theory and practice of higher education pedagogy through an examination of the existing literature. Topics may include but are not limited to student learning assessment, course design, teaching strategies, student diversity, technology in the classroom and reflective practice. Activities may include participation in workshops focusing on pedagogical practices in higher education offered through the Centre for Teaching and Learning Services.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li>UNIT 602 Development of a University Course (3 credits)<br>
In this directed study course, students develop the objectives, outline, content, notes, assignments, and assessment plan for the course that they will teach during UNIT 603, Internship in University Teaching. The prepared materials are evaluated by the students’ teaching mentor. This course is graded on a pass/fail basis.&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Admission requirements">
					
                    Admission requirements
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Currently enrolled as a doctoral student at Concordia, in good standing, admitted to candidacy, and on track for a timely completion of the doctoral program;</li>
<li>Written letter of support by doctoral supervisor;</li>
<li>Proof of completion of the Graduate Seminar in University Teaching and one teaching-assistantship;&nbsp;</li>
<li>Letter of support from teaching mentor;</li>
<li>Letter of support from Chair of the department in which the teaching internship will be completed which identifies the course reserved for the doctoral student;</li>
<li>Teaching philosophy statement.</li>
</ul>
<p>Applications will be considered for fall admissions only*.&nbsp; Deadline for application is February 1.</p>
<p>*Exceptionally, we will be accepting applications for Winter 2014. Deadline for Winter 2014 application is October 22, 2013.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Faculty research interests">
					
                    Faculty research interests
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_4" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Interdisciplinary Teaching</li>
<li>Integration of Computer Technologies in Higher Education</li>
<li>Cognition&nbsp;</li>
<li>Scholarship of Teaching &amp; Learning</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Assistantships & internships">
					
                    Assistantships & internships
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_3" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>UNIT 603 Internship in University Teaching (6 credits)</p>
<p>This internship requires students to teach one 3-credit university course in their discipline using the materials developed in UNIT 602, Development of a University Course. Students develop a teaching portfolio which includes a teaching statement, an explanation of pedagogical practices used in the course, self-evaluation of the teaching, students’ evaluations of the course, and a plan for improvements to the course content and teaching practices. This internship is graded on a pass/fail basis.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

                
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="c-sidebar span4">
                <div class="parsys program-parsys">


<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase box">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">    
        





<div class="breadcrumb breadcrumbs">

<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Graduate Academic dates</H1>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Fall Term 2013</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1" width="100%">
<tbody><tr><th width="554" height="20">What</th>
<th width="554" height="20">When</th>
</tr><tr><td><b>Fall/Winter Registration</b></td>
<td><i>Consult Graduate Program Director for exact dates of registration and for academic advice.</i></td>
</tr><tr><td>Labour Day, University closed</td>
<td>Monday, September 2, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Classes begin, Fall term<br>
</td>
<td>Tuesday, September 3, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td>Late registration and course change period begins<br>
Students incur a late registration fee when they register on or after the date that classes officially begin across the University</td>
<td>Tuesday, September 3, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td>Last day for final electronic submission of thesis through Spectrum, the Concordia Repository for students who are graduating in the Fall Term</td>
<td>Sunday, September 15, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Deadline for withdrawal with tuition refund* from two-term (/3 DNE) and fall-term courses (/2 DNE)</td>
<td>Monday, September 16, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Deadline for withdrawal from program for Fall Session</td>
<td>Monday, September 16, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Last day to add two-term (/3) and Fall-term (/2) courses</td>
<td>Monday, September 16, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">In Progress deadline to submit work for Summer 2013 courses</td>
<td>Monday, September 16, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Last day to apply for re-evaluation of courses ending in August 2013 (/1)</td>
<td>Tuesday, October 1, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td>Thanksgiving Day, University closed (see December 3, 2013)</td>
<td>Monday, October 14, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Last day for academic withdrawal from Fall-term courses (/2 DISC)</td>
<td>Sunday, October 27, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Fall Convocation</td>
<td>Thursday, November 21, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Last day to apply for Quebec Resident status for Fall Term 2013</td>
<td>Sunday, December 1, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Last day of classes, Fall Term</td>
<td>Monday, December 2, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Make-up day for classes scheduled on Monday, October 14</td>
<td>Tuesday, December 3, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Examinations begin</td>
<td>Wednesday, December 4, 2013</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Examinations end</td>
<td>Thursday, December 19, 2013</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Winter Term 2014</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1" width="100%">
<tbody><tr><th width="554" height="20">What</th>
<th width="554" height="20">When</th>
</tr><tr><td height="20"><b>Winter Registration</b></td>
<td><i>Consult Graduate Program Director for exact dates of registration and for academic advice.</i></td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Classes begin, Winter Term</td>
<td>Monday, January 6, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Late registration and course change period begins<br>
Students incur a late registration fee when they register on or after the date that classes officially begin across the University</td>
<td>Monday, January 6, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Last day for students to apply for Spring graduation</td>
<td>Wednesday, January 15, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Deadline for withdrawal with tuition refund* from Winter-term courses (/4 DNE)</td>
<td>Sunday, January 19, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Deadline for withdrawal from program for Winter Session</td>
<td>Sunday, January 19, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td>Last day to add Winter-term courses (/4)</td>
<td>Sunday, January 19, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">In Progress deadline to submit work for Fall 2013 courses</td>
<td>Sunday, January 19, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Last day to apply for re-evaluation of courses ending in December 2013 (/2)</td>
<td>Saturday, February 1, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Mid-term break begins</td>
<td>Monday, February 17, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">President’s Holiday, University closed</td>
<td>Friday, February 21, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Mid-term break ends</td>
<td>Sunday, February 23, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Last day for initial doctoral thesis submission to the Thesis Office for students who have applied for Spring graduation</td>
<td>Tuesday, March 4, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Last day for academic withdrawal from two-term (/3 DISC) and Winter-term (/4 DISC) courses</td>
<td>Sunday, March 9, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td height="20">Last day for initial master’s thesis submission to the Thesis Office for students who have applied for Spring graduation</td>
<td>Tuesday, March 18, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td>Last day to apply for Quebec Resident status for Winter 2014 term</td>
<td>Tuesday, April 1, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td>Last day of classes, Winter Term</td>
<td>Saturday, April 12, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td>Last day for final electronic submission of thesis through Spectrum, the Concordia Repository for students who are graduating in the Spring Term</td>
<td>Tuesday, April 15, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td>Examinations begin</td>
<td>Wednesday, April 16, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td>University Closed</td>
<td>Friday, April 18, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td>University Closed</td>
<td>Saturday, April 19, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td>University Closed</td>
<td>Sunday, April 20, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td>University Closed</td>
<td>Monday, April 21, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td>Examinations end</td>
<td>Tuesday, May 6, 2014</td>
</tr><tr><td>Victoria Day, University Closed</td>
<td>Monday, May 19, 2014</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><i>* Tuition refund only applies to diploma, certificate, independent, visiting, and qualifying programs.</i></p>

</div></div>


</div>

        </div>
    </div>

<div class="link-list quick-links">







<div class="c-quicklinks" >

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

        <div class="span8">
            <div class="post highlighted">            
                <h1 class="article-title">Montreal: the best city in Canada for students</h1>
                
                <div class="subtitle">Concordia’s hometown places ninth in the world in QS ranking</div>
                
                <div class="clearfix"></div>
                <div class="infos">
	                <div class="date">Posted on November 26, 2013</div>
	                <div class="separator">|</div>
	                <div class="author">
	                   <div class="author parbase picker">






	<span>By: Sarah Buck</span>
</div>

	                </div>
	                <div class="source">
	                   <div class="single source">





</div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="rte">
                    <div class="parbase details wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">

</div></div>

                </div>
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase image section"><div id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/stories/2013/11/26/montreal-s-mix-makesitthebestplaceincanadaforstudents/jcr:content/parsys/image"><img title="20130115-SGW-027-620" alt="20130115-SGW-027-620" class="cq-dd-image" src="/news/stories/2013/11/26/montreal-s-mix-makesitthebestplaceincanadaforstudents/_jcr_content/parsys/image.img.jpg/1385500363906.jpg"></div>
    
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/stories/2013/11/26/montreal-s-mix-makesitthebestplaceincanadaforstudents/jcr:content/parsys/image");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/now/2013/11/20130115-SGW-027-620.jpg", imageTitle: "20130115\x2DSGW\x2D027\x2D620" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Montreal is one of the 10 best cities in the world for students, according to a new international ranking by Quacquarelli Symonds (QS). Concordia’s hometown came first in Canada, second in North America, and ninth overall, after Paris, London, Singapore, Sydney, Zurich, Melbourne, Hong Kong and Boston.</p>
<p>“It’s exciting. It validates what we’ve been hearing from students,? says Matt Stiegemeyer, the university’s director of student recruitment in Student and Enrolment Services.</p>
<p>The 2013 Best Student Cities list looked at factors including affordability, employers’ perception of the quality of graduates and “student mix.?</p>
<p>QS — which also compiles the sought-after World University Rankings — gave Montreal the highest marks for “student mix.? The category was calculated in part by the ratio of students to the total population; Montreal has the highest number of university students per capita of any city in North America. It also got points for its proportion of international students.</p>
<p>“One of the things Concordia values is the diverse student population,? says Stiegemeyer. “It is one of the draws. If you’re looking to come to a place and really encounter new things, new people, new ideas, Montreal is a wonderful place for that.?</p>
<p>Caterina Monda, vice-president of cultural affairs for the university’s International Students Association, says Montreal’s “mix? has made an impression on her, too.</p>
<p>“It’s a very young city. When I walk downtown, everyone’s a student. And just walking down the street, you hear someone speaking Arabic, French, Chinese … It’s not standing still, this city. Students who come here are always blown away.?</p>
<p>Bradley Tucker, associate vice-president of Student and Enrolment Services, says Concordia is especially strong at capitalizing on the educational opportunities represented by a diverse student population.</p>
<p>“Our students get to come into contact with, and understand, people with very different backgrounds,? say Tucker. “In a classroom, we’ll have people who are looking at problems in very different ways — each of them enriching the thoughts of the others.?</p>
<p>Concordia students thrive in Montreal, says Monda. “The city is very unique, and the people they meet here are also very unique. It’s interesting to see them really bond. You won’t find that in other places.?<br>
&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase picker section">

						                <i class="sprites-icon-arrow-right-black"></i>
						                QS Best Student Cities list
						            </a>
						        </li>
		                     
		    </ul>
	    </div><hr> </div>


</div>

<div class="rte">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>82<sup><span style="font-size: 70.0%;">nd</span></sup>
 Congress of Acfas</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>May 12 to 16, 2014</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/events/calendar/2014/05/12/acfas-en/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="Acfas 2014" alt="Acfas 2014" class="cq-dd-image" src="/events/calendar/2014/05/12/acfas-en/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.png/1382537568285.png"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Concordia University is proud to welcome the 82<sup>nd</sup> Congress of l’<i>Association francophone pour le savoir — Acfas</i> in Montreal from May 12 to 16, 2014. This is a first for the university and coincides with Concordia’s 40<sup>th</sup> anniversary.</p>
<p>Research has evolved at an unprecedented rate in the last decades. The theme chosen 2014, Research: Zones of Creativity and Convergence, reflects this evolution. Researchers, graduate students and other research professionals are invited to take part in this not-to-be-missed event.</p>
<p>The Scientific Committee of the 82<sup>nd</sup> Congress invites the research community to submit proposals for colloquia and general session papers in French on the Acfas website at www.acfas.ca.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Featured Stories</h3>

</div></div>
<div class="news-grid-list parbase newsgridlist list section">









		<script type="text/javascript" src="/etc/designs/concordia/clientlibs/jquery-resizecrop.min.js"></script>

    
    







    
    
    
    

		<ul class="row c-list c-news-grid ">
        
                









<li class="span4">

    <div class="c-vignette" data-href="/news/stories/2013/11/13/back-for-more.html">
        <div class="box">
            <div class="title"><p>The Acfas experience</p></div>
            <div class="content">
                PhD candidate Alexandra Hillinger explains why she’s attending the international congress for a third time
                <div class="clearfix">
                                          
                </div>

        jQuery(function() {  
            $ = jQuery;
            $(document).on("click", ".c-vignette", function(){
                var datahref = jQuery(this).attr('data-href');
                if(datahref) window.location = datahref;
            });

                event.stopPropagation();
            });
        });
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	
	jQuery(window).load( function() {
		$ = jQuery;
        var w = $('.c-news-grid .media-object').width();
        var h = 0.8 * w;

		$('.c-news-grid img.media-object').css('max-width','none').resizecrop({ width:w , height:h });
        $('.c-news-grid div.media-object').css('width', w + 'px').css('height',h+'px');
    });

    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Event planning</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase image section"><div id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-planning/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="flower-table-piano742x372" alt="flower-table-piano742x372" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-planning/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375095189482.jpg"></div>
    
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-planning/jcr:content/content-main/image");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/flower-table-piano742x372.jpg", imageTitle: "flower\x2Dtable\x2Dpiano742x372" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Over 200 venues on campus, from classrooms, small conference rooms, to banquet halls, large theatres and amphitheatres</b></p>
<p>Whether you are a student, staff or a member of the general public and you’re organizing a student group activity, an association conference or even a film festival, Concordia has a space that’s just right.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Don’t know where to start?</h3>
<ul>
<li>Take a look at some of our&nbsp;<a href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues.html"><b>featured venues</b></a>&nbsp;for inspiration<br>
</li>
<li>Learn more about&nbsp;<a href="/hospitality/space-reservation.html"><b>reserving a space</b></a>.</li>
</ul>
<p>If you need some guidance while planning your event, check out our&nbsp;<a href="/hospitality/event-logistics.html"><b>event logistics</b></a>&nbsp;in order to ensure that your event is a success.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Tips to get started</h3>
<ul>
<li><b>Plan in advance! </b>The key to a successful event is to allow plenty of time for the planning process to ensure you have everything covered! Respect your deadlines, otherwise, you may jeopardize your event.</li>
<li><b>Consider the number of guests –</b> this will help you determine the space you need.</li>
<li><b>Pay attention to the details </b>– if you want to serve food or alcohol, or expect minors to attend, read our <a href="/hospitality/event-logistics/policies-forms.html" adhocenable="false"><b>policies</b></a>. You are responsible for adhering to all <b>relevant policies, booking terms and procedures</b> that apply to your event.</li>
<li><b>Provide an accurate description </b>of your event when you submit your request. If we have to get back to you with questions, it could take us longer to process your request.</li>
<li><b>Patience before promotion!</b> We evaluate all requests, so please wait until you receive an <b>official booking confirmation</b> from us before you advertise your event.</li>
<li><b>Request and review</b>&nbsp;our quotes and confirmations so you can plan accordingly.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase picker section">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Space reservation</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>How you reserve your space and plan your event depends on the venue you need and whether you are a student, Concordia staff or faculty or a member of the public.</p>
<p><b>Designated Space Administrators</b> (DSAs) manage and book all venues across the campus. To reserve your space, you must contact the appropriate person. Depending on the venue, you will make your reservation through Hospitality Concordia, or through another individual who manages that venue.</p>
<ul>
<li>Refer to the <b><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-DSA-List.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">DSA list [pdf]</a> </b>to see who manages the venue that interests you.</li>
<li>You can always <a href="mailto:hospitality.booking@concordia.ca" target="_blank" adhocenable="false"><b>contact Hospitality Concordia</b></a> for venue suggestions if you don’t know where to start.</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="hospitality"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open For venues managed by Hospitality Concordia">
					
                    For venues managed by Hospitality Concordia
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If the venue is managed by Hospitality Concordia, submit your space request with one of our on-line tools. Once you login, you will be able to browse through our venues and their availability, and have access to a wealth of event-planning resources and documents such as rental fees, checklists, university policies and forms.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section tabs">










    <script type="text/javascript">
	$ = jQuery;
	$(document).ready(function() {
	    $('#tabs a:first').tab('show');
	    var hash = window.location.hash;
	    if (hash == undefined || hash == ""){
	      var previouslyActive = getCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab");
          if (previouslyActive != undefined) hash = previouslyActive;
	    }
	    hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');

	    $('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
	        $(this).tab('show');
	        var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
	        window.location.hash = this.hash;
	        $('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
	        setCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab", this.hash, 1);
	    });
	});
        /** COOKIE GETTER AND SETTER FUNCTIONS **/
    function setCookie(c_name,value,exdays){
        var exdate=new Date();
        exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
        var c_value=escape(value) + ((exdays==null) ? "" : "; expires="+exdate.toUTCString());
        document.cookie=c_name + "=" + c_value;
    }
    function getCookie(c_name){
      var c_value=document.cookie;
      var c_start=c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
      if (c_start == -1)	{
        c_start=c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
      }
      if (c_start == -1){
        c_value=null;
      } else {
        c_start=c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
        var c_end=c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
        if (c_end == -1){
          c_end=c_value.length;
        }
        c_value=unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));
      }
      return c_value;
    }
	</script>
	
	<div class="c-tabs">
    
	    <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="tabs">
	        
		          <li><a href="#community" data-toggle="tab">For the Concordia community (student, staff or faculty)</a></li>
		        
	        
		          <li><a href="#public" data-toggle="tab">For the general public</a></li>
		        
	        
	    </ul>
	    <div class="tab-content">
	        <div class="tab-pane" id="community">
	           
	           <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-0">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Log into <a href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/"><b>MyConcordia.ca</b></a> and select <b>MyEvents Reservations</b>.</p>
<ul>
<li>Students who have a valid Concordia ID may browse venues and availability for student events, but only <b>authorized</b> <b>booking officers</b> may submit the request on the their behalf.&nbsp; To find out who your booking officer is, please contact the <a adhocenable="false" href="http://deanofstudents.concordia.ca/index.php">Dean of Students Office</a>.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	        <div class="tab-pane" id="public">
	           
	           <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-1">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>To browse Hospitality Concordia venues: visit MyEvents (<a href="http://aspasia.concordia.ca/virtualems/" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">aspasia.concordia.ca/virtualems/</a>).</p>
<p>To request a space reservation: complete the <a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Public-Booking-Request.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">MyEvents Public Request form</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	    </div>
	</div>
	</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="dsa"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open For venues managed by other DSAs">
					
                    For venues managed by other DSAs
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If the venue is managed by another DSA, please contact that individual directly. Refer to the <a target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-DSA-List.pdf" adhocenable="false"><b>DSA list</b></a> to see who manages the venue that interests you.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h4>Important notes about reserving campus spaces</h4>
<ul>
<li>All requests are <b>subject to approval</b> and events must adhere to <b><a adhocenable="false" href="/hospitality/event-logistics/policies-forms.html">all university policies</a></b>.</li>
<li>Temporary use of space on campus is subject to the <a href="http://concordia.ca/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/VPS-24.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Policy on Use of Temporary Space</a>, and to the <a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/booking-terms.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Booking Terms and Conditions</a>.</li>
<li>Requests are evaluated on a first-come, first-served basis. You can avoid processing delays by submitting detailed and accurate event information with your request.</li>
<li>Some venues require as many as 25 days’ advance notice, so please submit your request well in advance of your preferred event date.</li>
<li>Ask your DSA about the space’s maximum capacity to ensure your event does not exceed it.</li>
<li>Ensure that the space is equipped to suit your needs, otherwise you may need to make arrangements for equipment such as podiums, lighting, additional chairs, projectors and so on.</li>
<li>The DSA will send you an official booking confirmation when your request is approved.</li>
<li>If your event requires more than one DSA managed space, contact Hospitality Concordia to help facilitate the request process.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Are you part of the Concordia community?</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Are you a student, staff or faculty?<br>
Log into&nbsp;<a href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/"><b>MyConcordia.ca</b></a>&nbsp;and select&nbsp;<b>MyEvents Reservations</b>.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Are you a member of the general public?</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Visit&nbsp;<b>MyEvents&nbsp;<br>
</b>(<a href="http://aspasia.concordia.ca/virtualems/">aspasia.concordia.ca/virtualems/</a>)</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase picker section">

		<ul class="nav subnav">
			<li class="logo ">
				<a href="/hospitality.html">

            	<li class="dropdown active">
					
                    <a href="/hospitality/event-logistics.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Event logistics</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/hospitality/event-logistics/food-at-events.html">Food at events</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/hospitality/event-logistics/alcohol-at-events.html">Alcohol at events</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/hospitality/event-logistics/minors-at-events.html">Minors at events</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/hospitality/event-logistics/policies-forms.html">Policies and forms</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
                    <a href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Venues</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre.html">Loyola Jesuit Hall and Conference Centre</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues/ev-building.html">EV Building - 11th Floor</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>
        </ul>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

    <div class="container">
    
        <div class="row with_socialbar">

            <div class="share-this">

                    socialbar.scroll();
                });

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Event logistics</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Sometimes it’s the little details that help make your event a success. &nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p>Once you have <b><a adhocenable="false" href="/hospitality/space-reservation.html">chosen your space</a></b>, the next step is to explore the available service options in order to enhance your event.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="hospitality"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Hospitality Concordia is the Designated Space Administrator (DSA)">
					
                    Hospitality Concordia is the Designated Space Administrator (DSA)
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>For events where Hospitality Concordia is the Designated Space Administrator an Event Coordinator may be assigned to facilitate the event logistics for you depending on the type of event that you are holding. We can offer advice on budget planning, room set-up, catering, event themes and more.&nbsp;You can let us handle the details so you can enjoy your event with your guests.&nbsp;Contact us at <a href="mailto:hospitality.booking@concordia.ca" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">hospitality.booking@concordia.ca</a> or call (514) 848-2424 ext. 5981.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="dsa"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Other DSAs in the University">
					
                    Other DSAs in the University
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you are booking space through one of the other Designated Space Administrators in the University or handling the event logistics yourself, take a look at the list of internal <b><a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Internal-Suppliers-Contact-list.pdf" target="_blank">event-related suppliers</a></b>&nbsp;to see what is offered at the university.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>If you would like to include <a adhocenable="false" href="/hospitality/event-logistics/food-at-events.html">catering</a>&nbsp;or&nbsp;<a adhocenable="false" href="/hospitality/event-logistics/alcohol-at-events.html">alcoholic beverages</a>, or are hosting an event where <b><a adhocenable="false" href="/hospitality/event-logistics/minors-at-events.html">minors will be present</a></b>, our helpful resource pages will give you all the information you need as you go through the process.</p>
<p>Regardless of how you plan your details, as the event requestor it is important that you be aware of the university’s <b><a adhocenable="false" href="/hospitality/event-logistics/policies-forms.html">standards and policies</a></b> in order to ensure a safe and memorable experience for all of your guests.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/event-logistics/food-at-events.html'>Food at events</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/event-logistics/alcohol-at-events.html'>Alcohol at events</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/event-logistics/minors-at-events.html'>Minors at events</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/event-logistics/policies-forms.html'>Policies and forms</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Food at events</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark with-border" style=" color: # !important;   padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px;">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '>Catering survey</h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>We want to hear your comments. Your feedback is important to us, so please take a moment to complete this short <a target="_blank" href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/viewform?formkey=dGhDMVFBNHVXTHdaTWJfRmlHMUlPZ0E6MA#gid=0">Catering Survey</a>.&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image right" id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-logistics/food-at-events/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="food" alt="food" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-logistics/food-at-events/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1379623517387.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-logistics/food-at-events/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/food.jpg", imageTitle: "food" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p>In accordance with the <a href="http://concordia.ca/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/VPS-7.pdf" target="_blank">Policy on the Sale and Service of Food and Beverage Service on University Space [pdf]</a>review the definitions for catered and self-catered events below and follow the instructions that pertain to your event.</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Catered events</h2>
<blockquote>An event held on University space where a caterer prepares, handles, and manipulates the food and delivers and/or provides wait staff service on-site.</blockquote>
<h4>Catered event instructions</h4>
<ol>
<li>A Catered Event will be approved and provided by food service caterers who form part of the University’s <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Approved-Caterers-List.pdf">University Approved Caterers list</a>. Anyone wishing to host a Catered Event on University space must select a caterer from the University’s Approved Caterers list.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li>A Food Waiver is <b>not</b> required for Catered Events, however if the event organizer chooses to handle or manipulate the food which is delivered by the Approved Caterer, the event organizer must abide by the <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Procedures-for-sale-or-service-of-food.pdf">Procedures for the Sale or Service of Fo</a><a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Procedures-for-sale-or-service-of-food.pdf">od</a> and the <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Guide-for-food-handlers.pdf">Guide for Food Handlers</a>.</li>
</ol>
<hr>

<h2>Self-catered events</h2>
<blockquote>An event held on University space where the event organizer (or its representatives) comes into contact with food (preparing, handling, manipulating) either on or off-site.</blockquote>
<h4>Self-catered instructions</h4>
<p>(Select according to your activity)</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Self-Catered Events where lower risk foods are served/sold">
					<div class="lbl">A</div>
                    Self-Catered Events where lower risk foods are served/sold
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>A Food Waiver is <b>not</b> required for Self-Catered Events where Lower Risk Foods will be served or sold. However, the event organizer must abide by the <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Procedures-for-sale-or-service-of-food.pdf">Procedures for the Sale or Service of Food</a> and the <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Guide-for-food-handlers.pdf">Guide for Food Handlers</a>. The non-respect of the guidelines appearing the these documents may result in the shut down of the event, at the sole discretion of the University.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Self-Catered Events where higher risk foods are SERVED">
					<div class="lbl">B</div>
                    Self-Catered Events where higher risk foods are SERVED
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>A completed <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Food-Waiver-Form.pdf">Food Waiver</a> must be received by the University at least twenty-five (25) business days prior to the event date.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Self-Catered Events where higher risk foods are SOLD">
					<div class="lbl">C</div>
                    Self-Catered Events where higher risk foods are SOLD
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ol>
<li>A completed <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Food-Waiver-Form.pdf">Food Waiver</a> must be received by the Designated Space Administrator at least twenty-five (25) business days prior to the event date.</li>
<li>Special Events Permit is required by MAPAQ (Ministère de l'Agriculture, des Pêcheries et de l'Alimentation du Québec). A completed <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/MAPAQ-Application-Form-for-Special-Events-Permit-English.pdf">Special Event Permit application</a> must be received by MAPAQ at least twenty (20) days prior to the event date.</li>
</ol>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<hr>

<h4>Helpful definitions</h4>
<h5>Lower Risk Foods</h5>
<p>Foods that pathogens have trouble surviving in because they are drier, have a high sugar or salt content, or are more acidic. These foods do not need to be kept hot or cold. Examples of <b>lower risk foods</b>:</p>
<ul>
<li>Cakes (except cheesecake or cream(dairy) filled cakes which are considered High Risk Foods)</li>
<li>Cookies, squares/bars</li>
<li>Muffins</li>
<li>Cupcakes (except cream (dairy) filled which are considered High Risk Foods)</li>
<li>Fruit pies not requiring refrigeration</li>
<li>Tarts</li>
<li>Breads</li>
<li>Candies, popcorns, chocolates, fudge, brownies</li>
</ul>
<p>Although traditional bake sale foods such as bread, cakes, pies, cookies and candies rarely cause illness, it is important to remember that under the right circumstances any food can cause foodborne illness.</p>
<h5>Higher Risk Foods</h5>
<p>Foods that can support the growth of pathogens and/or foods that have been associated with causing food borne illness. These foods must be kept and served hot or cold (i.e. dairies, meats). Examples of <b>higher risk foods</b>:</p>
<ul>
<li>Cheesecake</li>
<li>Pumpkin and meringue pies</li>
<li>Frostings or fillings with cream cheese, custards, whipped cream or cheese</li>
<li>Meats</li>
<li>Dairies</li>
</ul>
<h5>Food Sold - Money Exchanges</h5>
<p>Money is collected on-site as food is sold or food is not sold on site <b>but</b> money is collected through a registration, admission, donation fee to attend the event, and the money collected goes towards the cost of the event or the food being provided.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues/ev-building.html">EV Building - 11th Floor</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>
        </ul>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Alcohol at events</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image right" id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-logistics/alcohol-at-events/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="glasses-250x125" alt="glasses-250x125" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-logistics/alcohol-at-events/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1376499224299.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-logistics/alcohol-at-events/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/glasses-250x125.jpg", imageTitle: "glasses\x2D250x125" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p>Events with alcohol must adhere to the <a href="http://concordia.ca/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/VPS-3.pdf" target="_blank">Policy on the Sale and Service of Alcohol on University Premises</a>, and regulations from the <i>Régie des Alcools, Course et des jeux</i> (RACJ).</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4>Alcohol Waiver</h4>
<ul>
<li>An <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Alcohol-Waiver-Form.pdf">Alcohol Waiver</a> is required for all alcohol-related events.</li>
<li>It must be submitted with your space request (see <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/hospitality/space-reservation.html">Request for space</a>), <b>twenty (20) business days </b>prior the the event date.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Permit to serve or sell alcohol</h4>
<p>In accordance with RACJ regulations, a permit to serve or sell alcohol (&quot;Reunion Permit for alcoholic beverages&quot;) may be required for your event.</p>
<ul>
<li>To know if you need a Reunion Permit, see <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-When-do-I-need-an-Alcohol-Permit.pdf">Criteria for Alcohol Reunion Permit</a>. This information is also provided in the waiver.<br>
</li>
<li>If you need a Reunion Permit, you must sent the completed <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Application-Form-for-Alcohol-Reunion-Permit.pdf">Reunion Permit application</a> to the RACJ Fifteen (15) days prior to your event.</li>
<li>If you intend to sell alcohol at your event, you <b>must </b>include a completed <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Questionnaire-to-Sell-Alcohol.pdf">questionnaire of your intentions</a> with your application. <b>Your Designated Space Administrator will provide you with a letter addressed to the RACJ which you must include with your application.</b></li>
</ul>
<h4>Responsibilities</h4>
<p>As the event organizer, you are responsible for assuming the costs of the Alcohol Reunion permits required at your event.</p>
<p>To assist you in completing the applications, see the following sample documents:</p>
<ol>
<li><a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Sample-Application-Form-for-Alcohol-Reunion-Permit.pdf">Sample Application for a Reunion Permit to serve or sell alcohol</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Sample-questionnaire-to-Sell-Alcohol.pdf">Sample Questionnaire if you intend to sell alcohol</a></li>
</ol>
<p><b>The permit provided by the RACJ must be visible at all times during the event, otherwise the event may be cancelled.</b></p>
<p>You are responsible for adhering to the <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Procedures-for-sale-or-service-of-alcohol.pdf">Procedures for the Sale or Service of Alcohol</a> set out in the Waiver, and the obligations per the Alcohol Reunion Permit.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/event-logistics/food-at-events.html'>Food at events</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/hospitality/event-logistics/alcohol-at-events.html'>Alcohol at events</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/event-logistics/minors-at-events.html'>Minors at events</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/event-logistics/policies-forms.html'>Policies and forms</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>
