            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Minors at events</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The <a href="http://concordia.ca/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/VPS-8.pdf" target="_blank">Policy Concerning Minors on Campus</a> applies to all persons, units or departments responsible for or involved in organizing events or programs on campus involving minors (persons under the age of eighteen and who are not Concordia students).</p>
<p>For example this Policy applies when minors are present on campus, without a parent or guardian, and where Concordia University is responsible for the safety and supervision of the minors.</p>
<p>Ensure that you complete and return the document which pertains to you:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="minors-campus"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Person, unit or department planning an activity involving minors on campus">
					
                    Person, unit or department planning an activity involving minors on campus
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>(including but not limited to a sports program, a music class, a course, or a day camp):</p>
<ul>
<li>Complete the <a href="http://concordia.ca/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/VPS-8_declaration.pdf" target="_blank">Declaration of an Activity</a> and return it to the insurance specialist at least <b>thirty (30) days</b> prior to the scheduled event/activity date.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="parents"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Parents of minors registering and/or attending programs held at the University">
					
                    Parents of minors registering and/or attending programs held at the University
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Complete a <a href="http://concordia.ca/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/VPS-8_waiver.pdf" target="_blank">Parental Waiver</a> and return to the person, unit or department organizing the program or activity, at least <b>twenty-four (24) hours</b> prior to the beginning of the event/activity.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>For more information or questions about the forms, please contact the Insurance/Liability Specialist at: <a href="mailto:jbaril@concordia.ca">jbaril@concordia.ca</a> or 514-848-2424 ext. 5867.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">

</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Policies and forms</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Space</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/VPS-24.pdf" target="_blank">Policy on Use of Temporary Space</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/booking-terms.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Booking Terms &amp; Conditions</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-DSA-List.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Designated Space Administration List</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/VPS-10.pdf" target="_blank">Policy on the Recognition of Student Organizations and the Use of University Space</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>Food</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/VPS-7.pdf" target="_blank">Policy on Food and Beverage Service on University Space</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Approved-Caterers-List.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">University Approved Caterers</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Food-Waiver-Form.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Food Waiver</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Criteria-for-Food-Waiver-or-Permit.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Criteria for a Food Waiver or Permit for Self-catered Events</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Procedures-for-sale-or-service-of-food.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Procedures for the Sale or Service of Food</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Guide-for-food-handlers.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Guide for Food Handlers</a></li>
<li>Ministère de l’Agriculture Pêcherie et Alimentation du Québec<ul>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/MAPAQ-Application-Form-for-Special-Events-Permit-English.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">MAPAQ Application Form for Special Event Permit</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.mapaq.gouv.qc.ca/fr/Pages/NousJoindre.aspx" target="_blank">Contact Information</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h3>Alcohol</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/VPS-3.pdf" target="_blank">Policy on the Sale and Service of Alcohol on University Premises</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Alcohol-Waiver-Form.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Alcohol Waiver</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Procedures-for-sale-or-service-of-alcohol.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Procedures for the Sale or Service of Alcohol</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-When-do-I-need-an-Alcohol-Permit.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Criteria for Alcohol Reunion Permit</a></li>
<li>Régie des alcools et des Jeux du Québec<ul>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Application-Form-for-Alcohol-Reunion-Permit.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Application for a Reunion Permit to serve or sell alcohol</a><ul>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Sample-Application-Form-for-Alcohol-Reunion-Permit.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Sample application form</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Questionnaire-to-Sell-Alcohol.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Questionnaire if you intend to sell alcohol</a><ul>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Sample-questionnaire-to-Sell-Alcohol.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Sample questionnaire</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h3>Minors on Campus</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/VPS-8.pdf" target="_blank">Policy Concerning Minors on Campus</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/VPS-8_declaration.pdf" target="_blank">Declaration of an Activity Involving Minor Children</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/VPS-8_waiver.pdf" target="_blank">Parental Waiver</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>Event-related Suppliers</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Internal-Suppliers-Contact-list.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Contact Info</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });

                    		<li class="">

				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/hospitality/event-logistics/alcohol-at-events.html">Alcohol at events</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/hospitality/event-logistics/minors-at-events.html">Minors at events</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/hospitality/event-logistics/policies-forms.html">Policies and forms</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown active">
					
                    <a href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Venues</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre.html">Loyola Jesuit Hall and Conference Centre</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues/ev-building.html">EV Building - 11th Floor</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>
        </ul>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');

        <p>Thanks for your time. Please select your area of feedback.</p>
        <ul>
            <li><a href="/web/feedback-forms/feedback-bad-link.html">I want to report a bad link</a></li>
            <li><a href="/web/feedback-forms/feedback-cant-find.html">I can't find something on the website</a></li>
            <li><a href="/web/feedback-forms/feedback-tell-us.html">I'd like to share my impressions of the site</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$=jQuery;
$(function() {
    var check = mobilecheck();
    if (!check) {
        $("#feedback-modal").attr("href", "#modal");
        $('a[rel*=leanModal]').leanModal({top: 200, closeButton: ".modal-close"});
    }
});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/main-floor-plan-seating-capacity.html'>Main floor plan and seating capacity</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/upper-level-floorplans-seating-capacity.html'>Upper level floor plans and seating capacity</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/history.html'>Loyola Refectory Restoration Campaign</a></li></ul>

<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<ul class="c-breadcrumb breadcrumb">

	        <li>

                    Loyola Jesuit Hall and Conference Centre
                </a>
	        </li>
	        &nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;
	        <li>
                <a href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/history.html" onclick="CQ_Analytics.record({event:'followBreadcrumb',values: { breadcrumbPath: '/content/concordia/en/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/history' },collect: false,options: { obj: this },componentPath: 'concordia/components/breadcrumb'})">
                    Loyola Refectory Restoration Campaign
                </a>
	        </li>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Loyola Refectory Restoration Campaign</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>About the restoration</h3>
<p>In an effort to celebrate its 100th anniversary and the revitalization of the Loyola Campus, the Loyola Alumni Association raised $4 million towards the Loyola Refectory Restoration Campaign.</p>
<p>The restoration of this historical building has recaptured the beauty of its original unique design and created a new space to meet university and the Notre-Dame-de-Grâce community event needs at the Loyola Campus.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>A bit of history</h3>
<p>Concordia’s history spans more than a century through the university’s founding institutions — Loyola College and Sir George Williams University. The university’s present success is attributed to the outstanding legacies inherited from these two cornerstone establishments.</p>
<p>The Refectory, which was completed in 1916, was one of the original buildings at Loyola College. It originally served as a dining hall, infirmary and meeting hall. It has also housed various academic and administrative units of the university, including (most recently) the Music Department.</p>
<p>Connected to the Psychology Building, the Refectory is in the shape of a cross and there is an impressive sundial at the top of the south side of the building.</p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase image section"><div id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/history/jcr:content/content-main/image_1"><img title="before-today" alt="before-today" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/history/_jcr_content/content-main/image_1.img.jpg/1375399004842.jpg"></div>
    
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/history/jcr:content/content-main/image_1");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/before-today.jpg", imageTitle: "before\x2Dtoday" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

            </div>

    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Loyola Jesuit Hall and Conference Centre</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Loyola Jesuit Hall and Conference Centre multi-purpose venue on Concordia’s west-end campus opened its doors in February 2012. Open to the public, the newly refurbished space is warm and inviting. The decor is a deft combination of modern, blonde wood doors and floor in the main room that contrast with the more traditional dark wood window and door frames and carpeting of the adjoining rooms. A gas fireplace and modern set of leather couches add to the coziness while the glass wall and steel lighting fixtures give the room a contemporary feel. A welcoming lounge area and three conference halls are situated on the main level. A seminar room and two small conference rooms also connected by a lounge, are on the upper level.</p>
<p>The newly restored centre has been outfitted with state-of-the-art equipment, while preserving its original charm and history. Located at Concordia’s Loyola Campus in the heart of Notre-Dame-de-Grâce, the centre boasts ample parking and is ideally suited to host meetings, workshops, receptions, weddings, as well as business and personal events.</p>
<h3>Floor plans and seating capacity</h3>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p style="text-align: center;"><a href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/main-floor-plan-seating-capacity.html" adhocenable="false"><img alt="Main floor plan" src="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/floor-plan-main-sm.gif"></a><br>
</p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><a href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/main-floor-plan-seating-capacity.html" adhocenable="false"><b>Main level</b></a></p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p style="text-align: center;"><a href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/upper-level-floorplans-seating-capacity.html" adhocenable="false"><img src="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/floor-plan-upper-sm.gif" alt="Upper floor plan"></a><br>
</p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><a href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/upper-level-floorplans-seating-capacity.html" adhocenable="false"><b>Upper level</b></a></p>

</div></div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Plan your next event</h2>
<p>The team at Hospitality Concordia would be delighted to help you plan your next event at the Loyola Jesuit Hall and Conference Centre and create a memorable experience for you and your guests.</p>
<ul>
<li><b>For a site visit and consultation on planning an event</b>,<br>
please contact Ms. Petra Alves, Hospitality Concordia at <a href="mailto:mwat@alcor.concordia.ca">petra.alves@concordia.ca</a> or 514-848-2424, ext 4947.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><b>To browse venue availability or make a reservation</b>,<br>
please log into <a target="_blank" href="http://aspasia.concordia.ca/virtualems/">MyEvents</a>. For the Concordia community, please log in to&nbsp;<a href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/"><b>MyConcordia.ca</b></a>&nbsp;and select&nbsp;<b>MyEvents Reservations</b>.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><b>For catering options</b>,<br>
view our <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Approved-Caterers-List.pdf">list of approved caterers</a> who look forward to serving you and your guests.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre.html'>Loyola Jesuit Hall and Conference Centre</a><div class='arrow open'><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/main-floor-plan-seating-capacity.html'>Main floor plan and seating capacity</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/upper-level-floorplans-seating-capacity.html'>Upper level floor plans and seating capacity</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/history.html'>Loyola Refectory Restoration Campaign</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/hospitality-venues/ev-building.html'>EV Building - 11th Floor</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

    <hr>

            <li><a href="/web/feedback-forms/feedback-tell-us.html">I'd like to share my impressions of the site</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$=jQuery;
$(function() {
    var check = mobilecheck();
    if (!check) {
        $("#feedback-modal").attr("href", "#modal");
        $('a[rel*=leanModal]').leanModal({top: 200, closeButton: ".modal-close"});
    }
});
</script>
</div>


</footer>
    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>EV Building - 11th Floor</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase image section"><div id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/hospitality-venues/ev-building/jcr:content/content-main/image_0"><img title="EV-Atrium2" alt="EV-Atrium2" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/hospitality/hospitality-venues/ev-building/_jcr_content/content-main/image_0.img.jpg/1376508074871.jpg"></div>
    
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/hospitality-venues/ev-building/jcr:content/content-main/image_0");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/EV-Atrium2.jpg", imageTitle: "EV\x2DAtrium2" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>With striking views of Montreal’s downtown landscape, the 11th floor&nbsp;common area and terrace of the&nbsp;Engineering, Computer Science and Visual Arts Integrated Complex (<a href="/maps/buildings/ev.html">EV Building</a>) is a bold, modern venue that has been a popular choice for events since its opening in 2005.</p>
<p>The two towers of this high-tech complex are completely integrated with links at every floor and a common corridor. <a href="/maps/buildings/ev.html" adhocenable="false">More</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre.html'>Loyola Jesuit Hall and Conference Centre</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/main-floor-plan-seating-capacity.html'>Main floor plan and seating capacity</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/upper-level-floorplans-seating-capacity.html'>Upper level floor plans and seating capacity</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre/history.html'>Loyola Refectory Restoration Campaign</a></li></ul></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/hospitality/hospitality-venues/ev-building.html'>EV Building - 11th Floor</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Are you part of the Concordia community?</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Are you a student, staff or faculty?<br>
Log into&nbsp;<a href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/"><b>MyConcordia.ca</b></a>&nbsp;and select&nbsp;<b>MyEvents Reservations</b>.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Are you a member of the general public?</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Visit&nbsp;<b>MyEvents&nbsp;<br>
</b>(<a href="http://aspasia.concordia.ca/virtualems/">aspasia.concordia.ca/virtualems/</a>).</li>
<li>If you are a new user you will have to create an account.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>

<div class="parbase picker section">






<div class="c-bloc-relatedlinks bloc">
            <h2 class="section-header">Contact us</h2>
		    <ul>
		        
						        <li>
						            <a href="/hospitality/contact.html">
						                <i class="sprites-icon-arrow-right-black"></i>
						                Staff directory
						            </a>

		    </ul>
	    </div><hr> </div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    Home
                </a>

<section id="content-main">

    <div class="container">

            </ul>

            <hr>

            <ul>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="Facebook" class="st_facebook_custom">
                    	<span class="sprites-icon-social-1" displayText="Facebook" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-planning.img.png/1376592163285.png'>Facebook</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="Twitter" class="st_twitter_custom">
                    	<span class="sprites-icon-social-2" displayText="Twitter" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-planning.img.png/1376592163285.png'>Twitter</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="LinkedIn" class="st_linkedin_custom">
                        <span class="sprites-icon-social-5" displayText="LinkedIn" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-planning.img.png/1376592163285.png'>LinkedIn</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>   
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();
                jQuery(window).scroll(function(){
                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Event planning</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase image section"><div id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-planning/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="flower-table-piano742x372" alt="flower-table-piano742x372" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-planning/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375095189482.jpg"></div>
    
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/event-planning/jcr:content/content-main/image");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/flower-table-piano742x372.jpg", imageTitle: "flower\x2Dtable\x2Dpiano742x372" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Over 200 venues on campus, from classrooms, small conference rooms, to banquet halls, large theatres and amphitheatres</b></p>
<p>Whether you are a student, staff or a member of the general public and you’re organizing a student group activity, an association conference or even a film festival, Concordia has a space that’s just right.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Don’t know where to start?</h3>
<ul>
<li>Take a look at some of our&nbsp;<a href="/hospitality/hospitality-venues.html"><b>featured venues</b></a>&nbsp;for inspiration<br>
</li>
<li>Learn more about&nbsp;<a href="/hospitality/space-reservation.html"><b>reserving a space</b></a>.</li>
</ul>
<p>If you need some guidance while planning your event, check out our&nbsp;<a href="/hospitality/event-logistics.html"><b>event logistics</b></a>&nbsp;in order to ensure that your event is a success.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Tips to get started</h3>
<ul>
<li><b>Plan in advance! </b>The key to a successful event is to allow plenty of time for the planning process to ensure you have everything covered! Respect your deadlines, otherwise, you may jeopardize your event.</li>
<li><b>Consider the number of guests –</b> this will help you determine the space you need.</li>
<li><b>Pay attention to the details </b>– if you want to serve food or alcohol, or expect minors to attend, read our <a href="/hospitality/event-logistics/policies-forms.html" adhocenable="false"><b>policies</b></a>. You are responsible for adhering to all <b>relevant policies, booking terms and procedures</b> that apply to your event.</li>
<li><b>Provide an accurate description </b>of your event when you submit your request. If we have to get back to you with questions, it could take us longer to process your request.</li>
<li><b>Patience before promotion!</b> We evaluate all requests, so please wait until you receive an <b>official booking confirmation</b> from us before you advertise your event.</li>
<li><b>Request and review</b>&nbsp;our quotes and confirmations so you can plan accordingly.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase picker section">






<div class="c-bloc-relatedlinks bloc">

	    </div><hr> </div>

        </ul>
    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Food &amp; Beverage Services</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image right" id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/food-beverage-services/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="dinning-room-h7-250x125" alt="dinning-room-h7-250x125" class="cq-dd-image" src="/hospitality/food-beverage-services/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1379690759172.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/food-beverage-services/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/dinning-room-h7-250x125.jpg", imageTitle: "dinning\x2Droom\x2Dh7\x2D250x125" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p>Hospitality Food &amp; Beverage Services offers a variety of selections for your dining experience. Our <a href="http://www.dineoncampus.ca/concordia/?cmd=DiningMap">dining outlets</a> are conveniently located on both the downtown Sir George Williams and Loyola campuses. <a href="http://www.dineoncampus.ca/concordia/?cmd=Menus">Operating hours and menus</a> vary to accommodate the community.</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="text parbase section"><p>Food Services oversees the student meal plan program for students living in residence on campus during the academic year. The program is also available to students living off-campus.</p>
<p>Vending machines offering a variety of drinks and snacks are located in buildings throughout the Sir George Williams and Loyola campuses.</p>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4>Payment options</h4>
<h5>For students</h5>
<p>Did you know that you could use your <b>student ID card</b> for payment at most of our dining locations? It's simple - upload money to your student ID, and when our cashiers swipe your card, the amount is automatically withdrawn. See cashier for details.</p>
<h5>For faculty and staff</h5>
<p>Faculty and staff can also enjoy the convenience of a debit card at authorized dining locations. You can load money onto a <b>Convenience Card</b>&nbsp;for personal use or upload funds charged to a departmental account code for quick and easy office take-outs. Cash is unnecessary - the purchase amount is automatically subtracted from the Convenience Card. See cashier for details.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image right" id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/food-beverage-services/jcr:content/content-main/textimage_0" style="width:auto;"><img title="veg250x125" alt="veg250x125" class="cq-dd-image" src="/hospitality/food-beverage-services/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage_0/image.img.jpg/1379690127585.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/food-beverage-services/jcr:content/content-main/textimage_0");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/veg250x125.jpg", imageTitle: "veg250x125" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><h4>Catering needs</h4>
<p>We also offer a variety of menu ideas for all of your catering needs, ranging from small meetings to high-end receptions and everything in between. If you would like to order from the catering menu or would like to have a special menu created for your event, our skilled caterers will help you make the best choice to fulfill your guests. Select from the <a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Approved-Caterers-List.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">University Approved Caterers list</a> for all your campus catering activities.</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>For more information about any of these services, please contact us at <a href="mailto:food.services@concordia.ca" adhocenable="false">food.services@concordia.ca</a>.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark with-border" style=" color: # !important;  margin: 0px 20px 20px 0px; padding: 10px 10px 16px 10px;">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '>Food Services contract</h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Concordia’s new Food Services contract will be awarded in May 2015. A Food Advisory Working Group has been established to recommend criteria to be integrated into the next agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp; </p>
<p>Consult the FAQ (updated November 2013 with a revised timeline):</p>
<ul>
<li><a target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/food-beverages/FAQ-Food-Services-Nov2013.pdf" adhocenable="false">FAQ: Concordia’s food service contract and RFP Process</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark with-border" style=" color: # !important;  margin: 0px 20px 20px 0px; padding: 10px 10px 16px 10px;">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '>Apple Pie Contest Winners</h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Congratulations to the winners of the Concordia University Food Services Apple Pie Contest!</b></p>
<p>Thank you so much to everyone who entered our contest.&nbsp; The winner's names were drawn on October 4<sup>th</sup>, 2013 and <a target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/food-beverages/Apple%20Pie%20Contest%20Winners.pdf" adhocenable="false">8 lucky people received an orchard-fresh home-made apple pie</a>, just in time to help celebrate Thanksgiving!&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">

</div></div>
<div class="parbase picker section">

	    </div><hr> </div>


</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$=jQuery;
$(function() {
    var check = mobilecheck();
    if (!check) {
        $("#feedback-modal").attr("href", "#modal");
        $('a[rel*=leanModal]').leanModal({top: 200, closeButton: ".modal-close"});
    }
});
</script>
</div>


</footer>
    </div>

</body>
</html>
</IIR>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Parking</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>We offer <a href="/maps/parking.html" adhocenable="false">parking facilities</a> on both the SGW and Loyola campus for members of the university community and our guests. The facilities on both campuses offer faculty and staff a reserved monthly parking space and daily parking is available to the entire community. The Loyola Campus offers daily parking, as well as student permit parking on a per semester basis (at the Sports Complex).</p>
<p>For more information, please contact us at <a href="mailto:parking@concordia.ca" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">parking@concordia.ca</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase picker section">






<div class="c-bloc-relatedlinks bloc">
            <h2 class="section-header">Contact us</h2>
		    <ul>
		        
						        <li>
						            <a href="/hospitality/contact.html">
						                <i class="sprites-icon-arrow-right-black"></i>
						                Staff directory
						            </a>
						        </li>
		                     
		    </ul>
	    </div><hr> </div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<div class="social">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Venues</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Please be sure to revisit this page. We'll feature more venues in the near future.<br>
</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase vignette section">



















<div class="c-vignette arrow " data-href="/content/concordia//en/hospitality/hospitality-venues/loyola-jesuit-hall-conference-centre.html"  >
	<div class="box">
	   
	       <div class="title">Loyola Jesuit Hall and Conference Centre
	        
	       </div>
	   
	       <div class="content">
	       
	           A modern, sophisticated and desirable multi- purpose venue with state-of-the art equipment. 
	       
	    </div>
	</div>      
	   <img title="LoyolaRefectory" alt="LoyolaRefectory" class="cq-dd-image" src="/hospitality/hospitality-venues/_jcr_content/content-main/vignette/image.img.jpg/1379351241969.jpg">
	
</div>
</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase vignette section">



















<div class="c-vignette arrow " data-href="/content/concordia//en/hospitality/hospitality-venues/ev-building.html"  >
	<div class="box">
	   
	       <div class="title">EV Building 11th floor common area & terrace
	        
	       </div>
	   
	       <div class="content">
	       
	           Engineering, Computer Science and Visual Arts Integrated Complex
	       
	    </div>
	</div>      
	   <img title="EV-Atrium2" alt="EV-Atrium2" class="cq-dd-image" src="/hospitality/hospitality-venues/_jcr_content/content-main/vignette_0/image.img.jpg/1379351332563.jpg">
	
</div>
</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

                    Home
                </a>
	        </li>

                <a href="/maps.html" onclick="CQ_Analytics.record({event:'followBreadcrumb',values: { breadcrumbPath: '/content/concordia/en/maps' },collect: false,options: { obj: this },componentPath: 'concordia/components/breadcrumb'})">
                    Campus maps

                    Buildings

<div class="mboxDefault" id="content-concordia-en-maps-buildings-ev-content-main-gallery">

<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-maps-buildings-ev-content-main-gallery';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-maps-buildings-ev-content-main-gallery';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/ev/jcr:content/content-main/gallery';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>
</div>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt1"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c0 span9"><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Engineering, Computer Science and Visual Arts Integrated Complex opened in September 2005, a striking addition to Montreal’s downtown landscape. The two towers of the high-tech complex are completely integrated with links at every floor and a common corridor.</p>
<p>The 17-storey Engineering and Computer Science tower houses research and graduate teaching labs, administrative offices, and the Dean’s Office. From the many disparate locations in which it was previously housed, this tower integrates a large part of the Faculty in a single space, fostering more effective interaction of researchers. Facilities include over 300 specialized labs, conference and meeting rooms, and student areas.</p>
<p>The Visual Arts tower includes some of Studio Arts (Print Media, Fibres, Photography, Design and Computational Arts), Art History and the Dean’s Office. It features improved facilities and equipment for traditional media but also offers access to cutting-edge digital technologies that are organized so they can be easily integrated into the creative process. It also boasts an art gallery, a black box theatre, art history amphitheatres and specialized facilities for Hexagram, the Institute for Research/Creation in Media Arts and Technologies.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/ev/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="Holly King mural" alt="Holly King mural" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/ev/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1379967378465.jpg"></div><small>Holly King mural in the EV atrium</small>
</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h3>Fitness and Recreation Centre</h3>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/ev/jcr:content/content-main/textimage_0" style="width:200px;"><img title="yoga" alt="yoga" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/ev/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage_0/image.img.jpg/1375094295864.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/ev/jcr:content/content-main/textimage_0");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/ev/yoga.jpg", imageTitle: "yoga" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p>The first phase of the new fitness and recreation facilities opened in September 2006. It includes a dance studio, a gymnasium, washrooms and locker rooms. The second phase of the construction, completed in January 2007, consists of fitting up the areas for spinning, cardio, weight lifting, karate/judo and aerobics.</p>
<p>The&nbsp;<a href="http://athletics.concordia.ca/campus/legym.html">Fitness and Recreation Centre</a>&nbsp;is available to students, faculty and staff.</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c1 span3"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

        </div>
    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Food &amp; Beverage Services</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image right" id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/food-beverage-services/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="dinning-room-h7-250x125" alt="dinning-room-h7-250x125" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/hospitality/food-beverage-services/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1379690759172.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/food-beverage-services/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/dinning-room-h7-250x125.jpg", imageTitle: "dinning\x2Droom\x2Dh7\x2D250x125" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p>Hospitality Food &amp; Beverage Services offers a variety of selections for your dining experience. Our <a href="http://www.dineoncampus.ca/concordia/?cmd=DiningMap">dining outlets</a> are conveniently located on both the downtown Sir George Williams and Loyola campuses. <a href="http://www.dineoncampus.ca/concordia/?cmd=Menus">Operating hours and menus</a> vary to accommodate the community.</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="text parbase section"><p>Food Services oversees the student meal plan program for students living in residence on campus during the academic year. The program is also available to students living off-campus.</p>
<p>Vending machines offering a variety of drinks and snacks are located in buildings throughout the Sir George Williams and Loyola campuses.</p>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4>Payment options</h4>
<h5>For students</h5>
<p>Did you know that you could use your <b>student ID card</b> for payment at most of our dining locations? It's simple - upload money to your student ID, and when our cashiers swipe your card, the amount is automatically withdrawn. See cashier for details.</p>
<h5>For faculty and staff</h5>
<p>Faculty and staff can also enjoy the convenience of a debit card at authorized dining locations. You can load money onto a <b>Convenience Card</b>&nbsp;for personal use or upload funds charged to a departmental account code for quick and easy office take-outs. Cash is unnecessary - the purchase amount is automatically subtracted from the Convenience Card. See cashier for details.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image right" id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/food-beverage-services/jcr:content/content-main/textimage_0" style="width:auto;"><img title="veg250x125" alt="veg250x125" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/hospitality/food-beverage-services/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage_0/image.img.jpg/1379690127585.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/hospitality/food-beverage-services/jcr:content/content-main/textimage_0");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/images/veg250x125.jpg", imageTitle: "veg250x125" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><h4>Catering needs</h4>
<p>We also offer a variety of menu ideas for all of your catering needs, ranging from small meetings to high-end receptions and everything in between. If you would like to order from the catering menu or would like to have a special menu created for your event, our skilled caterers will help you make the best choice to fulfill your guests. Select from the <a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/Concordia-Approved-Caterers-List.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">University Approved Caterers list</a> for all your campus catering activities.</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>For more information about any of these services, please contact us at <a href="mailto:food.services@concordia.ca" adhocenable="false">food.services@concordia.ca</a>.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark with-border" style=" color: # !important;  margin: 0px 20px 20px 0px; padding: 10px 10px 16px 10px;">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '>Food Services contract</h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Concordia’s new Food Services contract will be awarded in May 2015. A Food Advisory Working Group has been established to recommend criteria to be integrated into the next agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp; </p>
<p>Consult the FAQ (updated November 2013 with a revised timeline):</p>
<ul>
<li><a target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/food-beverages/FAQ-Food-Services-Nov2013.pdf" adhocenable="false">FAQ: Concordia’s food service contract and RFP Process</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark with-border" style=" color: # !important;  margin: 0px 20px 20px 0px; padding: 10px 10px 16px 10px;">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '>Apple Pie Contest Winners</h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Congratulations to the winners of the Concordia University Food Services Apple Pie Contest!</b></p>
<p>Thank you so much to everyone who entered our contest.&nbsp; The winner's names were drawn on October 4<sup>th</sup>, 2013 and <a target="_blank" href="/content/dam/concordia/services/event-planning/docs/food-beverages/Apple%20Pie%20Contest%20Winners.pdf" adhocenable="false">8 lucky people received an orchard-fresh home-made apple pie</a>, just in time to help celebrate Thanksgiving!&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">

</div></div>
<div class="parbase picker section">

	    </div><hr> </div>

<div class="street-address">7141 Sherbrooke Street W.</div>
<div><span class="locality">Montreal</span>, <span class="region">Quebec</span>, <span class="country-name">Canada</span></div>
<div class="postal-code">H4B 1R6</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Parking</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<a href="/maps/sgw-campus.html.html"><h3>Sir George Williams Campus</h3></a>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Daily indoor parking</h3>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="lb"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open LB garage entrance">
					
                    LB garage entrance
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Address</h3>
<ul style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">
<li>&nbsp;(<a href="/maps/sgw-campus.html?building=LB" adhocenable="false">1436 Mackay</a>) Tel: 514-848-2424 ext. 8777</li>
</ul>
<h3>Operating hours and costs:</h3>
<h5>Monday to Friday, 6 a.m. - midnight</h5>
<ul style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">
<li>$3.25 half an hour</li>
<li>$5.25 one hour</li>
<li>$7.50 one hour &amp; a half</li>
<li>$10.50 Exit before 6 p.m.</li>
<li>$6.25 Entry after 5 p.m.</li>
<li>$12.75 Daily maximum</li>
<li>$20 for a lost ticket</li>
</ul>
<h5>Saturday (September to May) 7 a.m. to 8 p.m., and Sunday, 9 a.m. - 8 p.m.</h5>
<ul style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">
<li>$6.25 flat rate</li>
</ul>
<h5>Accepted forms of payment:</h5>
<ul style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">
<li>Cash<br>
</li>
<li>MasterCard<br>
</li>
<li>Visa</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="fb"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Faubourg garage entrance">
					
                    Faubourg garage entrance
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Address</h3>
<ul>
<li>(<a href="/maps/sgw-campus.html?building=FB" adhocenable="false">1250 Guy</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3>Operating hours and costs:</h3>
<h5>Monday to Friday, 6 a.m. - midnight</h5>
<ul>
<li>$3.25 half an hour</li>
<li>$8.75 Early bird rate. Entry before 8:30 a.m.</li>
<li>$6.25 Entry after 4 p.m.</li>
<li>$12.75 Daily maximum</li>
<li>$20 for a lost ticket</li>
</ul>
<h5>Saturday (September to May) 7 a.m. to 8 p.m., and Sunday, 9 a.m. - 8 p.m.</h5>
<ul>
<li>$6.25 flat rate</li>
</ul>
<h5>Accepted forms of payment:</h5>
<ul>
<li>Cash<br>
</li>
<li>MasterCard<br>
</li>
<li>Visa</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Permit parking lots</h3>
<ul>
<li>SGW Campus Staff and faculty facilities</li>
<li>Staff and faculty permits for outdoor Hall Building and Annexes are $120 per month by automatic payroll deduction</li>
<li>Staff and faculty permits for Samuel Bronfman (outdoor) are $100 per month by automatic payroll deduction</li>
<li>Staff and faculty permits for Samuel Bronfman (indoor) are $115 per month by automatic payroll deduction</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Daily lots</h3>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="loyola"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Locations and costs">
					
                    Locations and costs
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/loyola-campus.html?building=AD">AD Building</a><br>
<i>Reserved for faculty and staff, AD permit holders only</i></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/loyola-campus.html?building=HA">Hingston Hall</a><br>
<i>Reserved for faculty and staff, HH permit holders only</i></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/loyola-campus.html?building=JR">Jesuit Residence</a><br>
<i>$5 per day </i></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/loyola-campus.html?building=PA">Athletics Complex</a><br>
<i>For permit holders or $5 per day</i></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/loyola-campus.html?building=TA">Terrebonne</a><br>
<i>$5 per day</i></li>
</ul>
<h5>Accepted forms of payment:</h5>
<ul>
<li>Coins</li>
<li>VISA</li>
<li>Mastercard</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Permit parking lots</h3>
<ul>
<li>Loyola Campus staff and faculty facilities (<a href="/maps/loyola-campus.html?building=AD" adhocenable="false">AD</a>, <a href="/maps/loyola-campus.html?building=HA" adhocenable="false">Hingston Hall</a> — front and back, <a href="/maps/loyola-campus.html?building=PA" adhocenable="false">Athletics Complex</a>)</li>
<li>Staff and faculty permits are $95 per month by automatic payroll deduction</li>
<li>Student permits are $175 per term</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
