<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Automated Banking Machines</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>For your convenience, automated banking machines have been strategically situated on both the Sir George Williams and Loyola campus for easy and convenient banking transactions.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Locker Services</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark with-border" style=" color: # !important;   padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px;">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '>Fall/Winter Locker Rentals </h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Rentals began as of September 3, 2013</h3>
<p>Lockers can be rented via the MyConcordia portal for the period of September to April 30, 2014.</p>

</div></div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Lockers are available for rent on both campuses, and renting one is as simple as logging onto myconcordia.ca. Through your portal, you can select the building, floor and desired location of the locker that best accommodates you and the fee is automatically charged to your student account. It's that simple!</p>
<p>Faculty and staff wishing to rent a locker for their business activities are welcome to contact us directly to make all of the necessary arrangements.</p>
<p>For more information, please contact us at <a href="mailto:lockers@concordia.ca" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">lockers@concordia.ca</a>.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase picker section">






<div class="c-bloc-relatedlinks bloc">
            <h2 class="section-header">Contact us</h2>
		    <ul>
		        
						        <li>
						            <a href="/hospitality/contact.html">
						                <i class="sprites-icon-arrow-right-black"></i>
						                Staff directory
						            </a>
						        </li>
		                     
		    </ul>
	    </div><hr> </div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

       <div class="form_leftcol"><div class="form_leftcollabel"><label for="_content_concordia_en_hospitality_contact_rsvp_jcr_content_content-main_start_time">Time you plan on attending (&quot;last call&quot; is 1:30): </label></div><div class="form_leftcolmark"> *</div></div>

       <div class="form_rightcol">
        <select class="form_field form_field_select" id="_content_concordia_en_hospitality_contact_rsvp_jcr_content_content-main_start_time" name="time" ><option value="Between 11:30 am – 12:30  pm">Between 11:30 am – 12:30  pm</option><option value="Between 12:00 pm – 1 pm">Between 12:00 pm – 1 pm</option><option value="Between 1 pm – 2 pm">Between 1 pm – 2 pm</option></select>
          </div>
        </div>
    <div class="form_row_description"></div>

</div>
<div class="text section"><div class="form_row">
        <div class="form_leftcol"><div class="form_leftcollabel"><label for="_content_concordia_en_hospitality_contact_rsvp_jcr_content_content-main_start_code">Cash payment will be collected onsite at the event, unless you are paying through Department budget code. If so, please indicate budget code to be charged: </label></div><div class="form_leftcolmark">&nbsp;</div></div>

        <div class="form_rightcol" id="code_rightcol"><div id="code_0_wrapper" class="form_rightcol_wrapper"><input class="form_field form_field_text" id="_content_concordia_en_hospitality_contact_rsvp_jcr_content_content-main_start_code" name="code" value="" size="6" style="width:300px;" onkeydown="" ></div></div></div><div class="form_row_description"></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

        <div class="span8">
            <div class="post highlighted">            
                <h1 class="article-title">No fees for spaces managed by Hospitality Concordia</h1>
                
                <div class="subtitle">Room rental fees waived for faculty, staff and students for university-related activities</div>
                
                <div class="clearfix"></div>
                <div class="infos">
	                <div class="date">Posted on January 22, 2013</div>
	                <div class="separator">|</div>
	                <div class="author">
	                   <div class="author parbase picker">






	<span>By: Silvia Cademartori</span>
</div>

	                </div>
	                <div class="source">
	                   <div class="single source">





</div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="rte">
                    <div class="parbase details wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">
<div class="img_wrapper" style="float: right; display: inline; margin: 0 0 1em 15px; width: 267px;"><div class="inner_shadow"><img width="267" height="201" src="no-fees-for-spaces-managed-by-hospitality-concordia/_jcr_content/images/image_jpg_0.img.jpg"></div>
<div class="caption">Photo by Concordia University</div>
</div>
<p>Effective February 1, room rental fees will no longer be charged to faculty, staff and students for university-related events, held in spaces managed by Hospitality Concordia.&nbsp;<br>
<br>
“This decision is part of our goal to support activities on campus and offer valuable customer service,? explains Marie-Josée Allard, director of Hospitality Concordia.<br>
<br>
The new event management system, MyEvents, outlines events that meet the criteria for waived fees. Event-related charges, such as the rental of audio visual equipment and room set-up fees will remain the responsibility of the user. The policy on the temporary use of university space will be updated to reflect the new practice.<br>
</p>
<p>Current booking practices still apply for spaces that are managed by department-designated space administrators. For a list of event spaces managed by Hospitality Concordia, log onto the MyConcordia portal and click on MyEvents in the menu.<br>
&nbsp;<br>
The waived fees exclude events that take place on campus prior to February 1. Refunds will be issued by Hospitality Concordia for events already booked to take place as of February 1.</p>
<p><b>Related links:</b><br>
•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MyEvents reservation system now live — NOW, January 8<br>
•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Planning an event on campus</p>

</div></div>

                </div>
                <div class="parsys">




</div>

                <hr>
                <div class="related-links parbase picker">






</div>

            </div>
        </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

        <div class="span8">
            <div class="post highlighted">            
                <h1 class="article-title">Hospitality Concordia to launch new event management system</h1>
                
                <div class="subtitle">MyEvents will replace UBookIt to plan campus events</div>
                
                <div class="clearfix"></div>
                <div class="infos">
	                <div class="date">Posted on November 27, 2012</div>
	                <div class="separator">|</div>
	                <div class="author">
	                   <div class="author parbase picker">






	<span>By: Silvia Cademartori</span>
</div>

	                </div>
	                <div class="source">
	                   <div class="single source">





</div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="rte">
                    <div class="parbase details wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">
<p>Hospitality Concordia will launch a new event management software system in January that will replace the current reservation tool, UBookIt. Called MyEvents, the new system will be used to request all spaces managed by Hospitality Concordia.</p><div class="img_wrapper" style="float:right; display:inline; margin:0 0 1em 15px; width:350px;"><div class="inner_shadow"><img width="350" height="228" src="concordia-to-launch-new-event-management-system-in-january/_jcr_content/images/image_jpg_0.img.jpg" alt="MyEvents will replace UBookIt for the planning of campus events | Photo by Concordia University"/></div> <div class="caption">MyEvents will replace UBookIt for the planning of campus events | Photo by Concordia University</div></div><p>The new system consolidates, in one location, all event-related policies, forms and information required to plan an event on campus, making it easier to plan and book campus events.<br /> <br /> &ldquo;MyEvents is a great system because it is comprehensive and streamlined,&rdquo; says Marie-Jos&eacute;e Allard, director, Hospitality Concordia. &ldquo;Before requesting space, you can see pictures and availabilities of our venues, and once requested, you get an immediate cost estimate and follow the status of your request online. We look forward to making MyEvents and its many new features available to the entire community soon.&rdquo;&nbsp; <br /> <br />The launch of MyEvents affects only space managed by Hospitality Concordia. Procedures to book space managed by other designated space administrators (DSAs) remain unchanged.&nbsp;</p><p><b>Related link:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <br /> &bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Hospitality Concordia</p> 
</div></div>

                </div>
                <div class="parsys">




</div>

                <hr>
                <div class="related-links parbase picker">






</div>

            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="parsys story-parsys">

$=jQuery;

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Locker Services</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark with-border" style=" color: # !important;   padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px;">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '>Fall/Winter Locker Rentals </h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Rentals began as of September 3, 2013</h3>
<p>Lockers can be rented via the MyConcordia portal for the period of September to April 30, 2014.</p>

</div></div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Lockers are available for rent on both campuses, and renting one is as simple as logging onto myconcordia.ca. Through your portal, you can select the building, floor and desired location of the locker that best accommodates you and the fee is automatically charged to your student account. It's that simple!</p>
<p>Faculty and staff wishing to rent a locker for their business activities are welcome to contact us directly to make all of the necessary arrangements.</p>
<p>For more information, please contact us at <a href="mailto:lockers@concordia.ca" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">lockers@concordia.ca</a>.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase picker section">






<div class="c-bloc-relatedlinks bloc">
            <h2 class="section-header">Contact us</h2>
		    <ul>
		        
						        <li>
						            <a href="/hospitality/contact.html">
						                <i class="sprites-icon-arrow-right-black"></i>
						                Staff directory
						            </a>
						        </li>
		                     
		    </ul>
	    </div><hr> </div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

$=jQuery;
$(function() {
    var check = mobilecheck();
    if (!check) {
        $("#feedback-modal").attr("href", "#modal");

});

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

        <div class="span8">
            <div class="post highlighted">            
                <h1 class="article-title">Hospitality Concordia retires UBookIt</h1>
                
                <div class="subtitle">New MyEvents reservation system coming in January</div>
                
                <div class="clearfix"></div>
                <div class="infos">
	                <div class="date">Posted on December 10, 2012</div>
	                <div class="separator">|</div>
	                <div class="author">
	                   <div class="author parbase picker">






	<span>By: Silvia Cademartori</span>
</div>

	                </div>
	                <div class="source">
	                   <div class="single source">





</div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="rte">
                    <div class="parbase details wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">
<div style="float:right; display:inline; margin:0 0 1em 15px; width:300px;" class="img_wrapper"><div class="inner_shadow"><img width="300" height="200" alt="" src="hospitality-concordia-retires-ubookit/_jcr_content/images/image_jpg_0.img.jpg"/></div></div> <p>Hospitality Concordia will retire the UBookIt reservation program on December 14 at 5 p.m. to prepare for the implementation in January of the new event management software system, called MyEvents.</p> <p>As of December 17, until MyEvents is up and running, space can be requested from Hospitality Concordia by completing a form that will be available at Hospitality Concordia&rsquo;s &lsquo;Planning an event on campus&rsquo; web page.<br /> <br /> &ldquo;We look forward to making MyEvents and its many new features available to the entire community,&rdquo; says Marie-Jos&eacute;e Allard, Hospitality Concordia&rsquo;s director. &ldquo;We thank all our clients for working with us during the transition period.&rdquo;<br /> <br /> The new event management system will be used to request all spaces managed by Hospitality Concordia. MyEvents will consolidate all event-related policies, waivers and information to make it easier to plan and book campus events. &ldquo;MyEvents is a great system because it is comprehensive and streamlined,&rdquo; says Allard. <br /> <br /> &ldquo;Before requesting space, you can see pictures of our venues and check on their availability,&rdquo; she says. &ldquo;Once you make a request, you get an immediate cost estimate, and then you can add services to your submitted request, as well as follow the status of your request online.&rdquo;<br /> <br /> Meeting and event spaces managed by designated space administrators are not affected by the launch of MyEvents, and the procedures currently in place for booking those spaces remain the same.</p> <p><b>Related links:</b><br /> &bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Hospitality Concordia <br /> &bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Planning an event on campus<br /> &bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;Hospitality Concordia to launch new event management system&rdquo; &mdash; NOW, November 27, 2012&nbsp;</p> 
</div></div>

                </div>
                <div class="parsys">




</div>

                <hr>
                <div class="related-links parbase picker">






</div>

            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="c-sidebar span4">
            <div class="parsys story-parsys">

</div>

            <div class="experts parbase find-an-expert box">






<div class="c-sidebar-findexpert bloc box-component-no-border" style="background-color: #ffffff">
    <h4 class="section-header">FIND AN EXPERT</h4>
    <p>Search for an expert to comment on any topic.<br><span class="muted">Enter a phrase or keyword</span></p>
    
    <form action="/news/media-relations/find-an-expert.html" method="GET">
        <fieldset>            
            <div class="input-append control-group">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    Home
                </a>

                    News
                </a>
	        </li>

<section id="content-main">
    <div class="container">
		<div class="with_socialbar">
			<div class="share-this">












	<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
        stLight.options({
            publisher: "864f3db6-11cb-4e7b-9c5f-0a8a836ac323",
            onhover: false,

        <div class="c-socialbar-cta">

<script type="text/javascript">
    $ = jQuery;

    $(document).ready(function() {
        $("#showMoreButton").click(function(){
            var showMoreButton = $(this);
            var newsGridList = showMoreButton.parents('.news-grid-list'); 
            var url = "/content/concordia/en/news/stories/jcr:content/news-grid.html?src=showmore&news-grid_start=" + newsGridList.find('.c-vignette').length;


            if( "null" != "null" ){
                url = url + "&cat=null";
            }
            
            if( "null" != "null" ){
                url = url + "&year=null";
            }

            if( "null" != "null" ){
                url = url + "&month=null";
            }
            console.log(url);

            showMoreButton.html("Loading...").addClass('disabled');
        
            // AJAX call is here:
            $.get(url, function(data) {
                // trim the response html (http://stackoverflow.com/q/14347611/1232792)
                var htmlString = data.trim();
                var stories = $( htmlString ).children();
                if ( stories.length > 0 ) {
                    newsGridList.find('.c-news-grid').append(stories);
                    setTimeout(function(){
                        var w = stories.find('.media-object').width();
                        var h = 0.8 * w;
                        stories.find('img.media-object').css('max-width','none').resizecrop({ width:w , height:h });
                        stories.find('div.media-object').css('width', w + 'px').css('height',h+'px');
                     }, 1000)
                    
                   
                } else {
                    showMoreButton.hide();
                }
                showMoreButton.html("Show more").removeClass('disabled');
            });
        });
    });
</script>


<div class="navbar">
    <button id="showMoreButton" class="btn btn-block">Show more</button>
</div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        jQuery(function() {  
            $ = jQuery;
            $(document).on("click", ".c-vignette", function(){
                var datahref = jQuery(this).attr('data-href');
                if(datahref) window.location = datahref;
            });
            $(document).on("click", ".c-vignette a.btn", function() {
                event.stopPropagation();
            });
        });
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	
	jQuery(window).load( function() {
		$ = jQuery;
        var w = $('.c-news-grid .media-object').width();
        var h = 0.8 * w;

		$('.c-news-grid img.media-object').css('max-width','none').resizecrop({ width:w , height:h });
        $('.c-news-grid div.media-object').css('width', w + 'px').css('height',h+'px');
    });

</script></div>

                <div class="span12">
                    <div class="parsys bottom">

</div>
   
                </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

	        <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="page-header parbase section"> 






<div class="c-intro row">
    <h1 class="span8 section-header">Concordia in the news</h1>

    
    <div class="span8">
        <p>Updated often, this page features stories of Concordians who appear in the news. Discover alumni, students, faculty and experts who recently made an impact in the media.</p>

    </div>
	<div class="span4">
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/news/media-relations/find-an-expert.html">
                    
                    Find a media expert
                    </a>
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/news/media-relations.html">
                    
                    Contact our Media Relations team
                    </a></div>
</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>Newsmaker of the week</h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/concordia-in-the-news/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="0-94 Richler Sized" alt="Journalist, son of Mordecai Richler, Jacob Richler" class="cq-dd-image" src="/news/concordia-in-the-news/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1385757688258.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/concordia-in-the-news/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/images/newsmakers/0-94 Richler Sized.jpg", imageTitle: "0\x2D94\x20Richler\x20Sized" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>The Mordecai Richler Reading Room opened this week to honour the late novelist, screenwriter and essayist. Richler attended Sir George Williams University, one of Concordia's founding institutions, between 1949 and 1951 and served as its writer in residence in 1968 and 1969.</p>
<p>The opening of the Richler Reading Room garnered national media coverage across various media outlets.&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; text-align: right;"><a href="/news/items/2013/11/29/Jacob-Richler.html" adhocenable="false">See the full coverage</a></p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; text-align: right;">&nbsp;</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>Researchers in the news</h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The scholarly work of Concordia faculty and researchers informs and improves society on many issues that affect our daily lives.&nbsp;<a adhocenable="false" href="/news.html">Visit the Research section to read news stories involving research at Concordia</a>,&nbsp;or read the most recent items here: &nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Anne Louise Davidson, professor in the Department of Education, in collaboration with her colleagues in Concordia’s Centre for the Study of Learning and Performance have developed an online tool to facilitate both learning and teaching. Known as the Electronic Portfolio Encouraging Active and Reflective Learning (ePEARL) the bilingual online software encourages self-regulated learning in students from kindergarten through high school. Davidson appeared on CJAD’s&nbsp;<a href="https://soundcloud.com/barry-morgan-show/epearl-app-developer-anne" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">The Barry Morgan Show</a>&nbsp;to discuss ePEARL and how it may help the high school drop out rates.&nbsp;<a href="http://academica.ca/top-ten/concordia-learning-software-could-improve-high-school-dropout-rate" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Academica Top 10</a>&nbsp;also mentions the research.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p style="text-align: right;">&nbsp;<a adhocenable="false" href="/news/concordia-in-the-news/researchers.html">More Researchers in the news</a></p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>Expert commentators</h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Concordia faculty and researchers are regularly asked to offer expert, informed opinions on many of today's most pressing problems. Read some of the latest news items about Concordians:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><a href="http://www.catholicregister.org/news/canada/item/17277-no-apartheid-in-israel-says-south-african-pastor" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">The Catholic Register</a>&nbsp;reports on the Israel Apartheid Weeks and the reactions of Canadian Jewish communities against the analogy between Israel and South African apartheid. Paul Allen, professor in the Department of Theology, is quoted in the article.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p style="text-align: right;">&nbsp;<a href="/news/concordia-in-the-news/expert-commentators.html" adhocenable="false">More Expert Commentators</a></p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>Students in the news</h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Current students at Concordia do outstanding academic work and get involved in community projects that improve our quality of life. See what they've been up to: &nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Mehdi Sabzalian, a student in the Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science and member of Space Concordia, appeared on&nbsp;<a href="http://www.btmontreal.ca/videos/2877409253001/" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Breakfast Television Montreal</a>&nbsp;this morning to discuss this year’s satellite design and their Kickstarter campaign. Please note pledges to their&nbsp;<a href="http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/981958479/help-us-build-a-satellite" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Kickstarter</a>&nbsp;campaign need to be made by Saturday, November 30 at 11:59 p.m.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><a href="http://thetyee.ca/Blogs/TheHook/2013/11/28/Protect-Citizen-Journalists/" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">The Tyee</a>&nbsp;publishes an op-ed written by Angela MacKenzie, a graduate student in the Department of Journalism, that calls for the protection of citizen journalists.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p style="text-align: right;">&nbsp;<a href="/news/concordia-in-the-news/students.html" adhocenable="false">More Students in the news</a></p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>Alumni in the news</h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Our alumni are featured in the media locally and around the world. <a href="/alumni-friends/news.html" adhocenable="false">Vist the Alumni News section</a>&nbsp;to access an archive of stories or read the latest list of stories:&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><a href="http://www.winnipegfreepress.com/arts-and-life/entertainment/music/free-press-critic-columnist-was-the-voice-of-classical-music-233804401.html" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">The Winnipeg Free Press</a>&nbsp;publishes an obituary for Gwenda Nemerofsky, a graduate of the Department of Music, who passed away on Tuesday, November 26. Nemerofsky was the Free Press’s classical music critic and columnist for almost a decade.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><a href="http://nationtalk.ca/story/maclaren-art-centre-barrie-winter-2013-exhibitions/" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Nation Talk</a>&nbsp;features a story about the various exhibits at the MacLaren Art Centre in Barrie, Ontario, which includes an exhibit by Nadia Myre, a graduate of the Faculty of Fine Arts.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p style="text-align: right;">&nbsp;<a href="/news/concordia-in-the-news/alumni.html" adhocenable="false">More Alumni in the news</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

        </div>
    </div>

</section>

                    </ul> 
	            </li>
        </ul>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

                    Home
                </a>
	        </li>

                    Publications & reports
                </a>
	        </li>
	        
</ul></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-news-publications-reports-content-main-vignette';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-news-publications-reports-content-main-vignette';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/jcr:content/content-main/vignette';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>
</div>

    <div class="c-vignette" data-href="/content/dam/concordia/publications-reports/docs/Bridge_2012_2013.pdf" >
        <div class="row">
            <div class="media-object pull-right">
                <img title="The Bridge Magazine" alt="The Bridge Magazine" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/_jcr_content/content-main/vignette_12/image.img.jpg/1375306798215.jpg">    
            </div>
            <div class="box right">
                <div class="title">The Bridge Magazine</div>
                <div class="content">
                    The Bridge is the New Student Program magazine with articles about Concordia people, places and programs. Want to enrich your university experience? [Periodically]
                    <div class="clearfix">
                        <a class="btn" href="/content/dam/concordia/publications-reports/docs/Bridge_2012_2013.pdf">Read The Bridge</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>   
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0	2 Columns (50%, 50%)
2;cq-colctrl-lt1	2 Columns (75%, 25%)
2;cq-colctrl-lt2	2 Columns (25%, 75%)
3;cq-colctrl-lt3	3 Columns (33%, 33%, 33%)
3;cq-colctrl-lt4	3 Columns (50%, 25%, 25%)

<div class="publication">
    <div class="c-vignette" data-href="/content/dam/concordia/publications-reports/docs/Graduate_Viewbook-2012-2013_eng.pdf" >
        <div class="row">
            <div class="media-object pull-right">
                <img title="Graduate Programs Viewbook" alt="Graduate Programs Viewbook" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/_jcr_content/content-main/vignette_11/image.img.jpg/1375306791429.jpg">    
            </div>
            <div class="box right">
                <div class="title">Graduate Programs Viewbook</div>
                <div class="content">
                    The Graduate Programs Viewbook presents the advantages of graduate study at Concordia for both specialized research and transdisciplinary study, along with information on admissions and the application process. [Periodically]
                    <div class="clearfix">
                        <a class="btn" href="/content/dam/concordia/publications-reports/docs/Graduate_Viewbook-2012-2013_eng.pdf">Get the Graduate Viewbook</a>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Thinking out loud</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Concordia University and the Globe and Mail present a national conversation series on the creative process</h3>
<p>From novels to the big top, musical scores to advertisements, creative output comes in all shapes and sizes. Creativity is also a focus for many researchers at Concordia University.</p>
<p>The Concordia University Thinking Out Loud conversation series on creativity, held in partnership with the Globe and Mail, will feature four discussions, held in front of live audiences. Each will pair one of the university’s researchers with a public figure for a stimulating and lively exchange about what it means to create. This moderated conversation series will give audiences the opportunity to hear thought-provoking dialogue about the place of the creative drive in the academy.</p>
<h4>Join the conversation…</h4>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">On the influence of the subliminal</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt3"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c0 span4"></div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c1 span4"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Do subliminal messages in popular media influence mass behaviour? Join the conversation with <b>Charles Acland</b> and <b>Terry O’Reilly</b>.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Thursday, March 6, 2014<br>
Conversation: 6 p.m.– 7 p.m.<br>
Book signings: 7:15 p.m.</p>
<p>Location:<br>
D.B. Clarke Theatre<br>
1455 De Maisonneuve Blvd. W.<br>
Henry F. Hall Building, Sir George Williams Campus</p>
<p>Registration to open in 2014.</p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c2 span4"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/jcr:content/content-main/image_0"><img title="" alt="file" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/_jcr_content/content-main/image_0.img.jpg/1380818323638.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="" alt="file" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1380818101986.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">On the academics of circus</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt3"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c0 span4"></div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c1 span4"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>How can one practice art as research and study art as process without losing sight of the initial artistic impulse? Join the conversation with <b>Louis Patrick Leroux</b> and Cirque du Soleil's <b>Lyn Heward</b>.</p>
<p>Wednesday, March 12, 2014</p>
<p>Conversation: 6 p.m.–7 p.m.</p>
<p>Location:<br>
Oscar Peterson Concert Hall<br>
7141 Sherbrooke Street West, Loyola Campus</p>
<p>Registration to open in 2014.</p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c2 span4"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/jcr:content/content-main/image_2"><img title="leroux" alt="leroux" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/_jcr_content/content-main/image_2.img.jpg/1380721903439.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/jcr:content/content-main/image_1"><img title="heward" alt="heward" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/_jcr_content/content-main/image_1.img.jpg/1380721927059.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">On the Writing of Inspiration</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt3"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c0 span4"></div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c1 span4"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Where does the inspiration come from? What is the difference between memoir and the novel? Join the conversation with <b>Josip Novakovich</b> and author <b>Peter Carey</b>.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Thursday, March 20, 2014<br>
Conversation: 6 p.m.– 7 p.m.<br>
Book signing: 7:15 p.m.</p>
<p>Location: <br>
Oscar Peterson Concert Hall<br>
7141 Sherbrooke Street West, Loyola Campus</p>
<p>Registration to open in 2014</p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c2 span4"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/jcr:content/content-main/image_3"><img title="novakovich" alt="novakovich" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/_jcr_content/content-main/image_3.img.jpg/1380721954953.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/jcr:content/content-main/image_5"><img title="carey" alt="carey" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/_jcr_content/content-main/image_5.img.jpg/1380721972208.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">On the Music of Creativity </h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt3"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c0 span4"></div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c1 span4"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>How can we compose beautiful and inspirational music that will improve lives? Join the conversation with <b>Sandeep Bhagwati</b> and CBC's <b>Jian Ghomeshi</b>.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Tuesday, March 25, 2014<br>
Conversation: 7 p.m.–8 p.m.<br>
Book signing: 8:15 p.m.</p>
<p>Location:<br>
Oscar Peterson Concert Hall<br>
7141 Sherbrooke Street West<br>
Loyola Campus</p>
<p>Registration to open in 2014</p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c2 span4"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/jcr:content/content-main/image_4"><img title="bhagwati" alt="bhagwati" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/_jcr_content/content-main/image_4.img.jpg/1380722002723.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase image section"><div id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/jcr:content/content-main/image_6"><img title="" alt="file" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/_jcr_content/content-main/image_6.img.jpg/1380817919427.jpg"></div>
    
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/publications-reports/conversation-series/jcr:content/content-main/image_6");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "", imageTitle: "" }';

            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

$=jQuery;
$(function() {
    var check = mobilecheck();

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                
                <h1>Christine Mota</h1>
                <h3>Director, Media Relations</h3>
              	<p>
                    
                        <img style="width: 306px;margin:0 15px 15px 0;float:left" src="/news/media-relations/media-team/christine-mota.img.png/1375093981419.jpg" alt="Christine Mota"/>
                    
                    <p class="p1">A graduate of Concordia University, Christine Mota joined Concordia's Public Relations Department in 1993, after a 15-year career in the Montreal broadcast industry. She had worked at various radio and TV stations as a newscaster, producer and talk-show host.</p>
<p class="p1">In 1995, she moved to the University Advancement Office - the fundraising arm of Concordia - where she worked on the Annual Giving Campaign and Concordia's Campaign for a New Millennium.</p>
<p class="p1">Christine returned to the Public Affairs (formerly Public Relations) Department in 1998, and became&nbsp;Coordinator of Media Relations for the University in 2001.</p>
<p class="p1">In January 2006, she was appointed Director of Media Relations and official University spokesperson.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

              	</p>
                	<div class="clear"></div>
                	<hr />
                	<h4>Contact</h4>
                	<address>
                		
                			Phone: 514-848-2424 ext. 4884<br />
                		
                		
                		
                		
	                		<a href="mailto:chris.mota@concordia.ca">chris.mota@concordia.ca</a><br />
                		
                        
				                    <a href="/news/media-relations.html">concordia.ca/mediarelations</a><br/>
                		
	                		<a href="https://twitter.com/@ChristineMota">@ChristineMota</a><br />
                		
                	</address>
                
            </div>

            <div class="span4">
            	<div class="parbase list sidebar list-media-relations">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $ = jQuery;

    $(document).ready(function() {
        $("#showMoreButton").click(function(){
            var showMoreButton = $(this);
            var newsGridList = showMoreButton.parents('.news-grid-list'); 
            var url = "/content/concordia/en/news/media-relations/news-releases/jcr:content/news-grid.html?src=showmore&news-grid_start=" + newsGridList.find('.thumbnail').length;


            if( "null" != "null" ){
                url = url + "&cat=null";
            }
            
            if( "null" != "null" ){
                url = url + "&year=null";
            }

            if( "null" != "null" ){
                url = url + "&month=null";
            }
            console.log(url);

            showMoreButton.html("Loading...").addClass('disabled');
        
            // AJAX call is here:
            $.get(url, function(data) {
                // trim the response html (http://stackoverflow.com/q/14347611/1232792)
                var htmlString = data.trim();
                var stories = $( htmlString ).children();
                if ( stories.length > 0 ) {
                    newsGridList.find('.c-news-grid').append(stories);
                    setTimeout(function(){
                        var w = stories.find('.media-object').width();
                        var h = 0.8 * w;
                        stories.find('img.media-object').css('max-width','none').resizecrop({ width:w , height:h });
                        stories.find('div.media-object').css('width', w + 'px').css('height',h+'px');
                     }, 1000)
                    
                   
                } else {
                    showMoreButton.hide();
                }
                showMoreButton.html("Show more").removeClass('disabled');
            });
        });
    });
</script>


<div class="navbar">
    <button id="showMoreButton" class="btn btn-block">Show more</button>
</div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        jQuery(function() {  
            $ = jQuery;
            $(document).on("click", ".c-vignette", function(){
                var datahref = jQuery(this).attr('data-href');
                if(datahref) window.location = datahref;
            });
            $(document).on("click", ".c-vignette a.btn", function() {
                event.stopPropagation();
            });
        });
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	
	jQuery(window).load( function() {
		$ = jQuery;
        var w = $('.c-news-grid .media-object').width();
        var h = 0.8 * w;

		$('.c-news-grid img.media-object').css('max-width','none').resizecrop({ width:w , height:h });
        $('.c-news-grid div.media-object').css('width', w + 'px').css('height',h+'px');
    });

</script></div>

<body class="concordia page right-sidebar ">
    <div id="boot">
        













<div class="link-list quick-links">







<div class="c-quicklinks" >
	<!-- Group of links -->
	<div class="container">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    Home
                </a>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Official Policies</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The policies in this section are Official University Policies. They are only available in this electronic format. You may browse the policies <a href="/web/policies-sector.html" adhocenable="false"><b>by sector</b></a>, and <a href="/web/policies-themes.html" adhocenable="false"><b>by theme</b></a>. Should there be a conflict with a policy posted elsewhere, the policies on these pages will be considered official and the most up-to-date.</p>
<h3>By sector</h3>
<div><ul>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#BD">BD - Board of Governors</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#SG">SG - Office of the Secretary-General</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#PR">PRVPAA - Office of the Provost &amp; Vice-President, Academic Affairs</a><ul style="margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0;">
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#DeanofStudents">Dean of Students</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Libraries">LA - Libraries</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#VPRSG">VPRGS - Office of the Vice-President, Research &amp; Graduate Studies</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#VPS">VPS - Office of the Vice-President, Services</a><ul class="nomargin">
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#General">General</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Security">Security Department</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#IITS">Instructional and Information Technology Services</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#EHS">Environmental Health and Safety Office</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Emergency">Emergency Management</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Facilities">Facilities Management</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#HR">Human Resources</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#CFO">CFO - Office of the Chief Financial Officer</a><ul>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Financial">Financial Services</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Purchasing">Purchasing Services</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#AAR">VPDER - Office of the Vice-President, Development and External Relations</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Academic">Selected Senate and Academic Policies</a></li>
</ul>
</div>
<h3>By theme</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#behaviour" adhocenable="false">Behaviour</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#studentlife" adhocenable="false">Student Life &amp; Academics</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#libraries" adhocenable="false">Libraries</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#research" adhocenable="false">Research</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#hr" adhocenable="false">Human Resources and Employee Relations</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#governance" adhocenable="false">Governance and Finance</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#operations" adhocenable="false">Operations</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#privacy" adhocenable="false">Privacy, Use of Name &amp; Intellectual Property</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#security" adhocenable="false">Security</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#health" adhocenable="false">Environmental Health &amp; Safety</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#fundraising" adhocenable="false">Fundraising</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>

                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase picker section">






<div class="c-bloc-relatedlinks bloc">
            <h2 class="section-header">Policies</h2>
		    <ul>
		        
						        <li>
						            <a href="/web/policies-sector.html">
						                <i class="sprites-icon-arrow-right-black"></i>

						            <a href="/web/policies-themes.html">
						                <i class="sprites-icon-arrow-right-black"></i>
						                By themes
						            </a>

		    </ul>
	    </div><hr> </div>


</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    <a href="#" title="LinkedIn" class="st_linkedin_custom">

<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-hospitality-contact-content-main-colctrl';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-hospitality-contact-content-main-colctrl';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/hospitality/contact/jcr:content/content-main/colctrl';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

                     <ul class="nav" role="navigation">

                             <a href="/fr.html" id="home-logo" role="link" title="Back to home">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">    
        





<div class="breadcrumb breadcrumbs">

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Politiques officielles</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Les documents suivants représentent les politiques officielles de l’Université. Ces dernières sont uniquement disponibles en format électronique. Vous pouvez les consulter&nbsp;<a href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html" adhocenable="false"><b>par secteur</b></a>&nbsp;ou&nbsp;<a href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-themes.html" adhocenable="false"><b>par thème</b></a>. En cas de conflit avec une politique affichée ailleurs, les présentes seront considérées comme les politiques officielles les plus à jour.</p>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<h1>Par secteur</h1>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#BD-fr">BD - Conseil d’administration</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#SG-fr">SG - Secrétariat général</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#PR-fr">PRVPAA - Vice-rectorat exécutif aux affaires académiques</a><ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#DeanofStudents-fr">Direction de la vie étudiante</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#Libraries-fr">LA - Bibliothèques</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#VPRSG-fr">VPRGS - Vice-rectorat à la recherche et aux études supérieures</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#VPS-fr">VPS - Vice-rectorat aux services</a><ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#General-fr">Généralités</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#Security-fr">Protection publique</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#IITS-fr">(Service des) Technologies de l’information et de l’enseignement IITS</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#EHS-fr">Service environnement, santé et sécurité</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#Emergency-fr">Gestion des urgences</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#Facilities-fr">Gestion des installations</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#HR-fr">Service des ressources humaines</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#CFO-fr">VPF - Bureau du Vice-rectorat aux finances</a><ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#Financial-fr">Services financiers</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#Purchasing-fr">Service de l’approvisionnement</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#AAR-fr">VPDER - Vice-rectorat au développement et aux relations extérieures</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-secteur.html#Academic-fr">Certaines politiques académiques</a></li>
</ul>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<h1>Par thème</h1>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-themes.html#conduite">Conduite</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-themes.html##vieetudiante">Vie étudiante et enseignement</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-themes.html#bibliotheque">Bibliothèques</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-themes.html#recherche">Recherche</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-themes.html#rh">Ressources humaines et relations avec le personnel</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-themes.html#gouvernance">Gouvernance et finance</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-themes.html#exploitation">Exploitation</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-themes.html#vieprive">Vie privée, utilisation du nom et propriété intellectuelle</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-themes.html#securite">Sécurité</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-themes.html#environnement">Environnement, santé et sécurité</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/fr/politiques-officielles/politiques-officielles-themes.html#collecte">Collecte de fonds</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase picker section">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">
