<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Archives</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Graduate Calendar is published by the School of Graduate Studies.</p>
<p>Please select a calendar year from the list below:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/archives/summer-2013.html">Summer 2013</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/archives/winter-2013.html">Winter 2013</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/archives/fall-2012.html">Fall 2012</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/graduate/calendar/archives/summer-2012.html">Summer 2012</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/archives/2011-12.html">2011-12</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/archives/2010-11.html">2010-11</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/archives/2009-10.html">2009-10</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/archives/2008-09.html">2008-09</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/archives/2007-08.html">2007-08</a></li>
<li><a href="/academics/graduate/calendar/archives/2006-07.html">2006-07</a></li>

</ul>

        <div class="navbar-inner">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="nav-collapse collapse">
                     <ul class="nav" role="navigation">
                         <li class="logo ">
                             <a href="/" id="home-logo" role="link" title="Back to home">
                               <span class="sprites-icon-home">Home</span>

                             <a href="/about.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle">About</a>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    Home
                </a>
	        </li>

                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Policies by sector</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The policies in this section are Official University Policies. They are only available in this electronic format. You may browse the policies <a adhocenable="false" href="/web/policies-sector.html"><b>by sector</b></a>, and <a adhocenable="false" href="/web/policies-themes.html"><b>by theme</b></a>. Should there be a conflict with a policy posted elsewhere, the policies on these pages will be considered official and the most up-to-date.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#BD">BD - Board of Governors</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#SG">SG - Office of the Secretary-General</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#PR">PRVPAA - Office of the Provost &amp; Vice-President, Academic Affairs</a><ul>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#DeanofStudents">Dean of Students</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Libraries">LA - Libraries</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#VPRSG">VPRGS - Office of the Vice-President, Research &amp; Graduate Studies</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#VPS">VPS - Office of the Vice-President, Services</a><ul>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#General">General</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Security">Security Department</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#IITS">Instructional and Information Technology Services</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#EHS">Environmental Health and Safety Office</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Emergency">Emergency Management</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Facilities">Facilities Management</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#HR2" adhocenable="false">Human Resources</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#CFO">CFO - Office of the Chief Financial Officer</a><ul>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Financial">Financial Services</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Purchasing">Purchasing Services</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#AAR">VPDER - Office of the Vice-President, Development and External Relations</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-sector.html#Academic">Selected Senate and Academic Policies</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">

<td valign="top" style="text-align: left;"><a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/CFO-7.pdf" target="_blank">CFO-7.pdf</a></td>
</tr><tr><td>CFO-8</td>
<td>Policy on Petty Cash</td>
<td><a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/CFO-8.pdf" target="_blank">CFO-8.pdf</a></td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top" style="text-align: center;" colspan="3"><b><a name="Purchasing"></a>Purchasing Services</b></td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top" style="text-align: left;">CFO-20</td>
<td valign="top" style="text-align: left;">Procurement Policy</td>
<td valign="top" style="text-align: left;"><a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/CFO-20.pdf" target="_blank">CFO-20.pdf</a></td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><a name="AAR"></a></h3>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   smallText table-condensed horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th valign="top" style="text-align: left;">Policy No.</th>

</form></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

$=jQuery;

<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1">
    <meta http-equiv="keywords" content="policies, policy">
    <meta http-equiv="description" content="The policies in this section are Official University Policies. They are only available in this electronic format. You may browse the policies by sector, and by theme. Should there be a conflict with a policy posted elsewhere, the policies on these pages will be considered official and the most up-to-date.">
    <title>Policies by theme</title>

    
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="/etc/designs/concordia/favicon.ico">
    

        
    <meta property="og:title" content="Policies by theme" />
    <meta property="og:description" content="The policies in this section are Official University Policies. They are only available in this electronic format. You may browse the policies by sector, and by theme. Should there be a conflict with a policy posted elsewhere, the policies on these pages will be considered official and the most up-to-date." />

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

                    Home
                </a>
	        </li>
	        &nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;
	        <li>
                <a href="/web/policies-themes.html" onclick="CQ_Analytics.record({event:'followBreadcrumb',values: { breadcrumbPath: '/content/concordia/en/web/policies-themes' },collect: false,options: { obj: this },componentPath: 'concordia/components/breadcrumb'})">
                    Policies by theme
                </a>
	        </li>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();
                jQuery(window).scroll(function(){
                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Policies by theme</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The policies in this section are Official University Policies. They are only available in this electronic format. You may browse the policies <a adhocenable="false" href="/web/policies-sector.html"><b>by sector</b></a>, and <b><a href="/web/policies-themes.html" adhocenable="false">by theme</a></b>. Should there be a conflict with a policy posted elsewhere, the policies on these pages will be considered official and the most up-to-date.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#behaviour">Behaviour</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#studentlife">Student Life &amp; Academics</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#libraries">Libraries</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#research">Research</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#hr">Human Resources and Employee Relations</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#governance">Governance and Finance</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#operations">Operations</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#privacy">Privacy, Use of Name &amp; Intellectual Property</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#security">Security</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#health">Environmental Health &amp; Safety</a></li>
<li><a href="/web/policies-themes.html#fundraising">Fundraising</a></li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

<li>Rules of Natural Justice (<a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/2011_Natural_Justice.pdf">Rules of Natural Justice</a>)</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2><a name="operations"></a>OPERATIONS</h2>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                             <a href="/international.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle">International</a>

                             <div class="dropdown-menu row-fluid position4" role="menu" style="z-index:10000;">
                                 <div class="span6 main-links">
                                      <ul>
                                           <li><a tabindex="-1" href="/international/students.html">International students</a></li>

                                  </div>

                                      <div class="quick-links">Quick links</div>
                                       <ul>
                                               <li><a tabindex="-1" href="http://international.concordia.ca/">Concordia International</a></li>
                                               <li><a tabindex="-1" href="http://supportservices.concordia.ca/iso/">International Students Office</a></li>
                                               <li><a tabindex="-1" href="/alumni-friends/alumni-network/international-chapters.html">Global alumni</a></li>
                                          </ul>
                               	  </div>
                                  <div class="view-all">
                                      <a href="/international.html">Overview of <span>International</span></a>
                               	  </div>
                              </div>
                         </li>
                     </ul>
                </div>
            </div>    
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();
                jQuery(window).scroll(function(){
                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Undergraduate Calendar</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>2011-12</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2011-12/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="Concordia Undergraduate Calendar 2011-12" alt="Concordia Undergraduate Calendar 2011-12" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2011-12/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1384557481913.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2011-12/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/images/calendar/cover11-12.jpg", imageTitle: "Concordia\x20Undergraduate\x20Calendar\x202011\x2D12" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><h4><br>
<br>
2011-2012<br>
Undergraduate Calendar</h4>
<p><br>
You may download the entire Undergraduate Calendar<br>
as one file:&nbsp;<b><a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/calendar/11-12/UGCalendar11-12.pdf" adhocenable="false">UGCalendar11-12</a>*</b></p>
<p>OR download&nbsp;individual PDF sections&nbsp;<b>below</b>.<br>
<br>
</p>
<p><b>*Please note that PDF version&nbsp;of the Undergraduate Calendar is up&nbsp;to date as of February 2011.</b></p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Undergraduate Calendar</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>2010-11</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2010-11/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="Concordia Undergraduate Calendar 2010-11" alt="Concordia Undergraduate Calendar 2010-11" class="cq-dd-image" src="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2010-11/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1384557706423.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2010-11/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/images/calendar/cover10-11.jpg", imageTitle: "Concordia\x20Undergraduate\x20Calendar\x202010\x2D11" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><h4><br>
<br>
2010-2011<br>
Undergraduate Calendar</h4>
<p><br>
You may download the entire Undergraduate Calendar<br>
as one file:&nbsp;<b><a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/calendar/10-11/UGCalendar10-11.pdf" adhocenable="false">UGCalendar10-11</a>*</b></p>
<p>OR download&nbsp;individual PDF sections&nbsp;<b>below</b>.<br>
<br>
</p>
<p><b>*Please note that PDF version&nbsp;of the Undergraduate Calendar is up&nbsp;to date as of February 2010.</b></p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<table border="0" width="680" cellspacing="0">
<tbody><tr><td width="100%"><table border="0" width="680" cellspacing="0">
<tbody><tr><td colspan="2"><h3><a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/calendar/10-11/TheUniversity-UGCalenadar10-11.pdf"><br>
 The University</a></h3>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="328" valign="top"><ul>
<li>Publication Information</li>
<li>Mission, Vision, Values</li>
<li>Table of Contents</li>
<li>About the University</li>
<li>Gender Neutral Degree Nomenclature</li>
<li>Academic Calendar</li>
<li>Administration</li>
<li>Admission Regulations</li>
<li>Mature Entry</li>
<li>Tuition and Fees</li>
<li>Academic Information: Definitions and Regulations</li>
<li>Academic Integrity and the Academic Code of Conduct<br>
</li>
</ul>
</td>
<td width="292" valign="top"><ul>
<li>Policy on the Establishment of Tribunal Hearing Pools</li>
<li>Rights and Responsibilities</li>
<li>Ombuds Office</li>
<li>Student Life and Student Services</li>
<li>International Students</li>
<li>Student and Alumni Associations</li>
<li>School of Extended Learning</li>
<li>Teacher Training and Teacher Certification</li>
<li>Institute for Co-operative Education</li>
<li>Convocation Medals and Prizes</li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="640" valign="top" colspan="2"><table border="0" width="680" cellspacing="0">

                <div class="nav-collapse collapse">
                     <ul class="nav" role="navigation">

                               <span class="sprites-icon-home">Home</span>

                         </li>
                     

                         <li class="dropdown ">
                             <a href="/about.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle">About</a>

                             <div class="dropdown-menu row-fluid position1" role="menu" style="z-index:10000;">
                                 <div class="span6 main-links">
                                      <ul>
                                           <li><a tabindex="-1" href="/about/administration-governance.html">Administration &amp; governance</a></li>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>2009-10</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2009-10/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="Concordia Undergraduate Calendar 2009-10" alt="Concordia Undergraduate Calendar 2009-10" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2009-10/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1384557740885.jpg"></div>

        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><h4><br>
<br>
2009-2010<br>
Undergraduate Calendar</h4>
<p><br>
You may download the entire Undergraduate Calendar<br>
as one file:&nbsp;<b><a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/calendar/09-10/UGCalendar09-10.pdf" adhocenable="false">UGCalendar09-10</a>*</b></p>
<p>OR download&nbsp;individual PDF sections&nbsp;<b>below</b>.<br>
<br>
</p>
<p><b>*Please note that PDF version&nbsp;of the Undergraduate Calendar is up&nbsp;to date as of March 2009.</b></p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

	            </div>

        </div>
    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Undergraduate calendar</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>2008-09</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2008-09/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="Concordia Undergraduate Calendar 2008-09" alt="Concordia Undergraduate Calendar 2008-09" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2008-09/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1384876877524.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/academics/undergraduate/calendar/2008-09/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/images/calendar/cover08-09.jpg", imageTitle: "Concordia\x20Undergraduate\x20Calendar\x202008\x2D09" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><h4><br>
2008-2009<br>
Undergraduate Calendar</h4>
<p><br>
You may download the entire Undergraduate Calendar<br>
as one file:&nbsp;<b><a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/calendar/08-09/TheUniversity-UGCalendar08-09.pdf" adhocenable="false">UGCalendar08-09</a>*</b></p>
<p>OR download&nbsp;individual PDF sections&nbsp;<b>below</b>.<br>
<br>
</p>
<p><b>*Please note that PDF version&nbsp;of the Undergraduate Calendar is up&nbsp;to date as of March 2008.</b></p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">

<li>General information</li>

<li>Accountancy</li>
<li>Decision Sciences and Management Information Systems</li>
</ul>
</td>
<td width="275" valign="top"><ul>
<li>Economics</li>
<li>Finance</li>
<li>International Business</li>

<li>Administration</li>

<li>Computer Science</li>

<li>Special Programs In Accountancy</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="568" valign="top" colspan="2"><table border="0" width="680" cellspacing="0">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1><a name="page"></a>
Academic Regulations</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2><a name="academicyear"></a>Academic Year</h2>
<p>The academic year begins with a Summer Session (May to August) followed by a Regular Session (September to April).</p>
<p><i>Summer Session:</i><br>
The Summer Session covers all courses offered from the beginning of May and the end of August.</p>
<p><i>Regular Session:</i><br>
The Regular Session is divided into a Fall Term (September to December) and a Winter Term (January to April), each of 15 weeks’ duration, including an examination period. The <a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/academic-calendar.html">Academic Calendar</a> at the beginning of this publication contains precise dates for the beginning and end of classes.</p>
<h2><a name="residence"></a>Residence</h2>
<p><b>Minimum Residence for Doctoral Degrees. </b>The minimum residence requirement for a doctoral degree is 6 terms (two years) of full-time graduate study beyond the master’s degree, or the equivalent in part-time study, or 9 terms (3 years) of full-time graduate study beyond the bachelor’s degree for those students who are permitted to enroll for doctoral studies without completing a master’s degree. It should be understood that this is a minimum requirement, and that a longer period may be necessary in order to complete all the work that is required for the degree. In special circumstances, departments may permit or require candidates to spend a period of time in residence at another institution, subject to the approval from the School of Graduate Studies. When such arrangements are made, it is understood that the candidate will be engaged in full-time study, and that the institution will be able to provide appropriate supervision and research facilities. In all cases, candidates for a doctoral degree from Concordia University must complete at least two years of graduate study at this university, including the final year of the required residence period.</p>
<p><b>Minimum Residence for Master’s Degrees. </b>The minimum residence requirement for the master’s degree is 3 terms (one year) of full-time study, or the equivalent in part-time study. This requirement must be met regardless of the amount of graduate work previously completed in any other program or at any other university. Certain master’s programs require longer periods of minimum residence.</p>
<p><b>Beyond Program Requirements. </b>Courses which are completed, but not counted towards a degree or diploma, may be identified on the record as <i>Beyond Program Requirements - Extra Credits</i>.</p>
<p><a href="#page">Top</a></p>
<h2><a name="timelimits"></a>Time Limits</h2>
<p>Students who exceed the time limit as outlined below will be withdrawn from their program. Under exceptional circumstances a time limit may be extended upon the recommendation of the Graduate Program Committee and the approval of the Dean of Graduate Studies.</p>
<p><b>Duration of Programs.</b> It is expected that full-time students will complete the requirements for most Doctoral Degree programs within 12 terms (4 years). It is also expected that full-time students will complete the requirements for Master’s/Magisteriate degree programs within 6 terms (2 years). It should be noted, however, that the duration of MFA, IMBA and MIM programs is different. Details are listed below.</p>
<p><b>Time Limits for Doctoral Degrees.</b> All work for a doctoral degree must be completed within 18 terms (6 years) of full-time study or 24 terms (8 years) of part-time study from the time of original registration in the program.</p>
<p><b>Time Limits for Master’s/Magisteriate Degrees. </b>All work for a master’s/magisteriate degree for full-time students must be completed within 12 terms (4 years) from the time of initial registration in the program at Concordia University; for part-time students the time limit is 15 terms (5 years). In the case of the MBA (Investment Management Option) and the Master in Investment Management programs, the time limit for full-time students is 15 terms (5 years). In the case of the MBA, the time limit for full-time students is 9 terms (3 years). In the case of the EMBA, the time limit for full-time students is 6 terms (2 years).</p>
<p><b>Time Limits for Diploma Programs. </b>All work for a diploma program must be completed within 6 terms (2 years) from the time of initial registration in the program for full-time students; for part-time students the time limit is 12 terms (4 years). Students in the Diploma in Investment Management are expected to complete the Diploma in no more than four years from the year of initial registration in the program.</p>
<p><b>Time Limits for Graduate Certificate Programs. </b>All work for a graduate certificate program must be completed within 6 terms (2 years) from the time of initial registration in the program for full-time students; for part-time students the time limit is 12 terms (4 years). In the case of the graduate certificate in Management Accounting, the time limit is 9 terms (3 years).</p>
<h2><a name="academicstanding"></a>Academic Standing</h2>
<p>The academic progress of graduate students is monitored on a periodic basis. To be permitted to continue in the program, students in master’s and doctoral programs must maintain a cumulative Grade Point Average (GPA) of at least 3.00 based on a minimum of 12 credits. Students whose GPA falls below 3.00 are considered to be on academic probation during the following review period. Students whose GPA falls below 3.00 for two consecutive review periods are withdrawn from the program. Individual programs may have more stringent GPA regulations; students should check their program’s calendar entry or with the <a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/graduate/program-contacts.html">Graduate Program Director</a></p>
<p>Students in graduate diploma and graduate certificate programs must maintain a minimum GPA of 2.70 during their program of study in order to be considered in good academic standing. Students whose GPA falls below 2.70 are considered to be on academic probation during the following review period. Students whose GPA falls below 2.70 for two consecutive review periods are withdrawn from the program. Individual programs may have more stringent GPA regulations; students should check their program’s calendar entry or with the <a href="/academics/graduate/program-contacts.html">Graduate Program Director</a></p>
<p>Students in qualifying programs or concurrent qualifying programs in undergraduate courses will be assigned a grade in accordance with the undergraduate grading system. For all courses a <i>B</i> grade is required in order to ensure that the minimum standards of the graduate grading system are maintained. In addition, students must meet specific program requirements for good academic standing. Any grade lower than a <i>C</i> will be considered a failing grade and in such cases students will be withdrawn from the degree or diploma program for which these courses are required.</p>
<p><a href="#page">Top</a></p>
<h2><a name="thesissupervision"></a>Thesis Supervision</h2>
<p>Students who do not have a supervisor when required by their program will be withdrawn from that program. Students may request to be allowed to remain registered in the program after this point for a maximum of four months in order to secure a new supervisor.</p>
<h2><a name="crule"></a>C Rule</h2>
<p>Graduate students who receive more than one C grade during the course of their studies will be withdrawn from the program unless continuation in the program is requested by the student’s program or Faculty and approved by the Dean of Graduate Studies. Course-based programs in the John Molson School of Business apply a term-by-term GPA requirement. Students should refer to the section on Academic Standing in their program’s calendar entry. Students who have been withdrawn may apply for re-admission (see <a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/graduate-admission.html#readmission">Re-Admission of Withdrawn Students</a> in Graduate Admission section). Students who receive another C after re-admission will be withdrawn from the program and will not be considered for re-admission. Individual programs may have more stringent regulations; students should check their program’s entry or with the <a href="/academics/graduate/program-contacts.html">Graduate Program Director</a></p>
<h2><a name="frule"></a>F Rule</h2>
<p>Graduate students who receive a failing grade in the course of their studies will be withdrawn from the program unless continuation in the program is requested by the student’s program or Faculty and approved by the Dean of Graduate Studies. If withdrawn from program, students may apply for re-admission (see <a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/graduate-admission.html#readmission">Re-Admission of Withdrawn Students</a> in Graduate Admission section). Students who receive another failing grade after re-admission will be withdrawn from the program and will not be considered for re-admission.</p>
<h2><a name="gpa"></a>GPA Graduation Requirement</h2>
<p>In order to graduate, students in doctoral and master’s programs must have a cumulative GPA of at least 3.00. Students in diploma and graduate certificate programs must have a cumulative GPA of at least 2.70 in order to graduate. Individual programs may have more stringent regulations; students should check their programs’ regulations or with the <a href="/academics/graduate/program-contacts.html">Graduate Program Director</a></p>
<h2><a name="graduation"></a>Graduation Application</h2>
<p>Degree, diploma, and certificate candidates who expect to complete their program requirements in a particular term must apply to graduate by filling out the <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/graduation/ready-to-graduate.html">online Graduation Application Form</a>. The form should be completed by <b>January 15</b> for spring graduation and <b>July 15</b> for fall graduation.</p>
<p><b>Note:</b> In programs requiring a master’s or doctoral thesis, there are deadlines for thesis submission which must be met if a student is to graduate at a particular graduation. These deadlines are outlined in the <a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/graduate/calendar/current/academic-calendar.html">Academic Calendar</a></p>
<h2><a name="credits"></a>Credit System</h2>
<p>Concordia University has adopted a system of assigning credits to the components of its graduate programs. This system was recommended by the Conseil des Universités du Québec for implementation in all the universities of the Province of Québec. The fundamental concepts in this system are defined in the Rapport du Conseil des Universités sur les Diplômes Universitaires. The credit base takes into account the total activity of the student in terms of lectures, seminars, conferences, laboratories, studio or practice periods, practica, and research, including, where appropriate, the number of hours of personal work required, as estimated by the university. A credit is considered to represent a minimum of 45 hours devoted by the student to an educational activity as described above.</p>
<h2><a name="language"></a>Language of Instruction</h2>
<p>While the language of instruction in Concordia University is normally English, students have the right to write their assignments and examinations in French. It must be understood, however, that in a case where a professor cannot read French, the assignments and examinations must be read by another professor, with possible disadvantages and delays for the student. Students are advised to enquire of the instructor at the beginning of the course whether assignments and examinations written in French will be read personally by the professor. Notwithstanding the above, language and literature departments may require assignments and examinations to be written in the language being studied.</p>
<p><a href="#page">Top</a></p>
<h2><a name="grading"></a>Grading System</h2>
<p>The grades and other notations described and defined in this section are those used for the evaluation of graduate courses and certain other graduate degree and diploma components. Some programs have academic regulations supplementing these definitions and descriptions. Such additional regulations define what is required in terms of grades for a student to be considered <i>in good standing</i> in a program. Refer to the relevant program section of this calendar and, where the academic regulations for a program have not been stated, consult the <a href="/academics/graduate/program-contacts.html">Graduate Program Director</a>. Grades used for graduate courses or courses taken as part of a graduate program are <i>A+</i>, <i>A</i>, <i>A-</i>, <i>B+</i>, <i>B</i>, <i>B-</i>, <i>C</i>,<i> Pass</i>, <i>F</i>, <i>Fail</i>, <i>Fail/Absent (F/ABS)</i>, <i>Audit</i> and <i>In Progress (IP)</i>.</p>
<p>The weight accorded to the various elements of the performance of each student is at the discretion of the instructor or instructors responsible for the course. At the beginning of a course the instructor will provide students with the evaluation scheme in writing. The scheme cannot be altered without appropriate notice.</p>
<ol>
<li>Each doctoral and master’s program has a rule which limits the number of <i>C</i> grades a student may obtain, and still meet the degree requirements. Diploma and Certificate programs also limit the number of <i>C</i> grades a student may obtain. (See <a href="#crule">C Rule</a> above).<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><i>Fail</i> or <i>F</i> describes work below the acceptable standard in a course. When a student receives a <i>Fail</i>, <i>F</i> or a <i>Fail/Absent (F/ABS)</i> grade in any course taken as part of a graduate program, it is the responsibility of the department or Faculty to recommend to the School of Graduate Studies whether or not the student should be permitted to continue in the program.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><i>Fail/Absent (F/ABS)</i> is used when the instructor at the end of the course has not received the required work and has not granted an extension of the deadline. It is a permanent grade.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li>Using the grade point equivalents listed below, <i>grade point averages</i> are calculated and used to measure academic achievement: <i>A+</i> = 4.30, <i>A</i> = 4.00, <i>A-</i> = 3.70, <i>B+</i> = 3.30, <i>B</i> = 3.00, <i>B-</i> = 2.70, <i>C</i> = 2.00, <i>Fail</i> = 0, <i>F</i> = 0 and <i>Fail/Absent (F/ABS)</i> = 0.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><i>Audit </i>is the grade assigned to courses that are not taken for credit and which do not count towards the completion of a program. A course taken for this grade must be so designated at the beginning of the term. Students may audit a graduate course with permission of the <a href="/academics/graduate/program-contacts.html">Graduate Program Director</a> of the program in which the course is offered, once the director is satisfied that the student is qualified to take the course. Auditing students are expected to attend class, but are not required to complete assignments or write examinations.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><p><a name="IP"></a>The <i>In Progress (IP)</i> notation is used when a student, who has completed a substantial portion of the course, cannot complete the course in time for reporting grades due to circumstances beyond their control. This notation may be assigned only to individual students, not to entire classes. The <i>IP</i> notation is only used in combination with a valid course grade (e.g. “<i>B/IP</i>?, “<i>F/IP</i>?). The grade is assigned on the basis that the missing work is graded as zero <b>and included</b> in calculating the overall grade. Students must complete courses with <i>IP</i> notations <b>by the DNE deadline</b> of the following term or the Fall DNE deadline for Summer term courses (see Academic Calendar for precise dates). If the course is not completed, the <i>IP</i> notation will be removed at the DISC deadline and an <i>INC</i> notation will be recorded along with the grade and the grade will become the permanent grade. If the course is completed after the DNE deadline the grade will not be changed (e.g. “<i>B/INC</i>?, “<i>F/INC</i>?). The Incomplete (<i>INC</i>) notation is used to indicate that the student did not complete the required work for the course.</p>
<p>Under exceptional circumstances an additional period of In Progress Extension (<i>IPE</i>) may be granted by the School of Graduate Studies. Requests for an <i>IPE</i> notation should be submitted as a student request, supported by relevant documentation including confirmation of the instructor’s support for a further extension prior to the DNE deadline.</p>
<p>Either graduate programs or the School of Graduate Studies may prevent/remove course registrations on the basis of outstanding <i>IP/IPE</i> notations on the student record.</p>
<p>Grades with <i>IP</i> or <i>IPE</i> notations are not included in GPA calculations.</p>
<p>Grades with an INC notation are included in the GPA calculations.</p>
<p>Students with <i>F/IP</i> (or <i>F/IPE</i>) will not be considered for a Leave of Absence until the program recommends continuance (May Continue). The student will be required to complete the course(s) with <i>IP/IPE</i> notations by the DNE deadline following their return from Leave.</p>
<table cellspacing="6" cellpadding="6" width="625" height="142">
<thead><tr><th>Academic&nbsp;Term&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</th>
<th>IP&nbsp;Deadline&nbsp;to&nbsp;submit<br>
outstanding&nbsp;work&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</th>
<th>IPE&nbsp;deadline&nbsp;to&nbsp;submit<br>
outstanding&nbsp;work</th>
</tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>Summer Term</td>
<td>&nbsp;&nbsp;September 17, 2012</td>
<td>&nbsp;&nbsp;December 20, 2012</td>
</tr><tr class="highlightcream"><td>Fall Term</td>
<td>&nbsp;&nbsp;January 20, 2013</td>
<td>&nbsp;&nbsp;April 30, 2013</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<br>
</li>
<li><i>Accepted (ACC) or Rejected (REJ)</i> is the final grade given to a thesis or thesis-equivalent. Under exceptional circumstances, the School of Graduate Studies can apply a grade of <i>F</i>.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><i>Pass or Fail</i> is the final grade normally given to comprehensive examinations, internships and language proficiency examinations. Students who fail a comprehensive examination may be permitted to sit for a second examination. Students who fail a language proficiency examination may be permitted to make no more than two further attempts to satisfy the requirement.</li>
</ol>
<p>In addition, the following are notations which are not grades:</p>
<ol>
<li><i>Discontinued (DISC)</i> is used to indicate that the student withdrew from the course in question before the withdrawal deadline. Discontinued courses and notations are recorded on official transcripts.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><i>Medical (MED)</i> is used on students’ records to indicate that long-term illness has rendered it not possible for the student in question to complete the academic requirements of a given course or activity. It is a permanent notation; it has no grade point equivalent.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><i>No Credit (No-Cr)</i> indicates that a student has not fulfilled the requirements of the course. This notation is limited to the Diploma in Chartered Accountancy program, which is recognized as a qualification to write the Uniform Final Examination (UFE), and it applies only to ACCO 685. A student receiving a No-Cr notation must repeat the course in the next semester in which the course is offered.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><i>Pending (PEND)</i> is used when a grade has not been reported at the time of production of a transcript.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><i>Replace (REPL)</i> indicates that the credit earned for this course cannot be retained because it will be replaced with another course as specified by the program. The grade will contribute to the CGPA.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><i>Repeat (REPT) </i>indicates that the credit earned for this course cannot be retained because it is a repetition of a course, or of similar course material, already completed. The grade will contribute to the CGPA.</li>
</ol>
<p>In cases where the original grade is not calculated correctly, the final grade can be altered.</p>
<h2><a name="deadlines"></a>Grade Submission Deadlines</h2>
<p>All final grades for all courses are required to be submitted no later than seven calendar days after the University’s last scheduled final examination.</p>
<h2><a name="supplemental"></a>Supplemental Examinations</h2>
<p>Graduate students are not permitted to write supplemental examinations.</p>
<h2><a name="comprehensive"></a>Comprehensive Examinations</h2>
<p>Comprehensive examinations are under the auspices of individual programs and students are advised to consult with their <a href="/academics/graduate/program-contacts.html">Graduate Program Director</a> concerning program regulations. While the School of Graduate Studies’ general regulations permit a student to write comprehensive examinations a second time, individual programs may have a more stringent regulation in this regard (i.e., not permitting a second writing) and students should verify this with the program. Comprehensive examinations are graded as Pass or Fail. In cases where two attempts are permitted, an initial grade of fail is not reported on the student’s academic record or academic transcript.</p>
<p><b>Note:</b> Unless expressly permitted by the instructor, the possession of electronic communication devices is prohibited during examinations.</p>
<p><a href="#page">Top</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Mission Statement</h1>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<blockquote>The School of Graduate Studies provides academic leadership and administrative support in fulfillment of Concordia University's commitment to deliver high-quality education and training to graduate students and postdoctoral fellows. Working closely with departments in and across all Faculties, the School fosters the continued success of existing programs and promotes the development of new programs that will attract top students both nationally and internationally. By valuing the integrity of different forms of knowledge acquisition and production from research and artistic creation to professional training and accreditation, the School serves as a hub for innovative thinking about how best to enrich the quality of graduate students' and postdoctoral fellows' experiences at all levels. Through its dedication to program excellence, as well as in its responsibility for ensuring the highest standards of teaching, supervision, and research training, the School affirms the vital contribution that graduate studies and postdoctoral training make to the advancement of knowledge and betterment of society.</blockquote>

</div></div>


</div>

        </div>
    </div>

</section>

$=jQuery;
$(function() {
    var check = mobilecheck();
    if (!check) {
        $("#feedback-modal").attr("href", "#modal");

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt5-c1 span3"><div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '>Prepare for convocation</h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/students/graduation/convocation.html" target="_self">Get your gown</a>

</div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt5-c2 span3"><div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '>At the <br>ceremony</h2>
    <div class="parsys">

</div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt5-c3 span3"><div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '>Pick up / mailing of diploma</h2>

</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="section separator">




    <hr>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Graduate program contacts</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h5>Graduate Program Directors &amp; Program Assistants</h5>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Graduate Program Directors are responsible for managing all aspects of their programs and for advising students on academic matters. Graduate Program Assistants are responsible for advising students on administrative matters and may help the Director with academic advising. Although assistants may advise students on administrative matters, it is the student’s responsibility for knowing the rules, regulations, policies and deadlines in the Graduate Calendar.</p>
<p>Following is a list of all Graduate Program Directors and Graduate Program Assistants by faculty. If you are having difficulty viewing or printing this page please&nbsp;<a href="http://gradstudies.concordia.ca/gpd_list/">visit this link</a>&nbsp;and print.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase external section"><iframe src="
http://gradstudies.concordia.ca/gpd_list/
" width="
850
" height="
10800
"></iframe>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/academics/undergraduate.html'>Undergraduate programs</a></li><li class='open'><a class='' href='/academics/graduate.html'>Graduate programs</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/academics/extended-learning.html'>School of Extended Learning</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/academics/co-op.html'>Institute for Co-operative Education</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/academics/study-abroad.html'>Study abroad</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>
