            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();
                jQuery(window).scroll(function(){
                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Methods of payment</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The University <b>will not accept cash or credit cards</b> for the payment of student tuition and compulsory fees. Payments can be made using any of the following methods.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Online Interac payment service">
					
                    Online Interac payment service
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Students who bank with the <b>Bank of Montreal</b>, <b>TD Canada Trust</b>, <b>Scotiabank </b>or the <b>Royal Bank of Canada</b> may take advantage of this online payment service. The payment appears on the student's account the instant the payment is approved. Access this service through the student portal via Student Accounts Services » Online Payment » Pay Instantly.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Online/web banking or telephone banking">
					
                    Online/web banking or telephone banking
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><span style="font-size: 12px;">Note:</span></h3>
<p>Each bank's processing time varies and it normally takes a <b>minimum of 3 - 5 business days</b> for the payment to appear on a student's account.</p>
<p>Service offered by Canadian chartered banks. The student must set up Concordia University as a payee and use his/her 7-digit student ID number as the Concordia account number.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image"><a href="http://www.cibc.com"><img title="CIBC_logo" alt="CIBC_logo" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image.img.gif/1377202215279.gif"></a></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_0"><a href="http://www.bmo.com"><img title="bmo_bank_logo" alt="bmo_bank_logo" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_0.img.gif/1377202237401.gif"></a></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_1"><a href="http://www.lbcdirect.laurentianbank.ca"><img title="Laurentian_logo" alt="Laurentian_logo" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_1.img.gif/1377202237604.gif"></a></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_2"><a href="http://www.hsbc.ca"><img title="hsbc_logo" alt="hsbc_logo" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_2.img.gif/1377202237932.gif"></a></div>
</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_3"><a href="http://www.royalbank.com"><img title="RBC_logo" alt="RBC_logo" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_3.img.gif/1377202312146.gif"></a></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_4"><a href="http://www.nbc.ca"><img title="Nationalbank_logo" alt="Nationalbank_logo" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_4.img.gif/1377202369776.gif"></a></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_5"><a href="http://www.scotiabank.com"><img title="Scotiabank_logo" alt="Scotiabank_logo" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_5.img.gif/1377202312364.gif"></a></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_6"><a href="http://www.tdcanadatrust.com"><img title="TD_Logo" alt="TD_Logo" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image_6.img.gif/1377202312473.gif"></a></div>
</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Automatic teller machines (ATM) in Canada">
					
                    Automatic teller machines (ATM) in Canada
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><span style="font-size: 12px;">The student must set up Concordia University as a payee with their Canadian banking institution and use his/her 7-digit student ID number as the Concordia account number.</span></p>
<p>Note:<br>
Each bank's processing time varies and it normally takes a minimum of 3 - 5 business days for the payment to appear on a student's account.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open By Canada Post">
					
                    By Canada Post
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><span style="font-size: 12px;">A </span><b style="font-size: 12px;">personal or certified cheque,</b><span style="font-size: 12px;"> </span><b style="font-size: 12px;">money order </b><span style="font-size: 12px;">or </span><b style="font-size: 12px;">bank draft</b><span style="font-size: 12px;"> can be mailed as follows. The cheque must be made payable to </span><b style="font-size: 12px;">Concordia University</b><span style="font-size: 12px;"> and a legible </span><b style="font-size: 12px;">student I.D. number</b><span style="font-size: 12px;"> must be written on both the front </span><b style="font-size: 12px;">and</b><span style="font-size: 12px;"> back of the cheque. The cheque payment is mailed to</span></p>
<p>Concordia University<br>
c/o Student Accounts Office<br>
Postal Box 339<br>
Place d'Armes Post Office<br>
Montreal, QC H2Y 3L9</p>
<p>Note:<br>
All corrections made to a cheque, e.g. wrong date, amount, etc. must be initialled by the bank account holder. Otherwise, our bank may not process the cheque, the cheque will be returned to the student and the student will be charged a returned item processing fee.</p>
<p>Students can avoid mailing and processing delays by preparing a <b>post-dated cheque</b>, making it payable on the deadline date and mailing it well ahead of the payment deadline date. Our bank will process the payment on the date noted on the cheque and the payment will appear on the student's account by the payment deadline date. The student will not be charged a late payment fee or interest for any cheque that is negotiable (dated) on the deadline date, e.g. September 30 th for fall term fees.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open International Wire Transfer Payment">
					
                    International Wire Transfer Payment
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_3" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>U.S. and International students are able to log on to their student portal to use Concordia University's International Wire Payment service offered through Western Union. Western Union allows U.S. and International students to pay for their tuition in the currency of their choice, while providing a simple and reliable way of initiating payments electronically.</p>
<p>Access this service through the student portal (<a href="http://www.myconcordia.ca">www.MyConcordia.ca</a>) -&gt; Student Account Services -&gt; International Wire Payments.</p>
<ul>
<li>Enter all the necessary bank details and the amount of tuition in Canadian dollars that you want to wire to your student account.</li>
<li>Select your payment currency and finalize your transaction to guarantee your <u>exchange rate</u>.</li>
<li>Please read the conditions stated on the confirmation screen carefully.</li>
<li><b><u>As the exchange rate is only valid for 72 hours</u></b> the <i>Payment Confirmation Form</i> must be taken to your local bank within 1 to 3 days.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open In-person payments">
					
                    In-person payments
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_4" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>In-person payments made at the Birks Student Service Centre in S-LB-185 can be made by personal or certified cheque, money order, bank draft or debit card (Interac).</p>
<p>Note:<br>
Canadian banks limit the &quot;daily&quot; amount that can be withdrawn with a debit (Interac) card even if the monies are available in the student's bank account. Before going to the Birks Student Service Centre to pay a large sum by debit card, students are asked to contact their bank to advise them that a large payment will be made. The bank should also be advised of the amount of the payment. Your bank will temporarily lift the &quot;per day&quot; limit, and your payment will be processed by Concordia without undue delays.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Pick up your gown</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Wearing a gown and hood for your Faculty is one of the fun parts of Convocation. It’s an academic tradition! Convocation is an academic ceremony, and all participants wear academic dress – also known as regalia – for the occasion.</p>
<p>The gown you wear for Convocation depends on whether you’re receiving your bachelor’s, master’s or doctorate. See what <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/graduation/convocation/academic-dress.html">academic dress</a> you’ll be wearing for Convocation and instructions on how to wear it.</p>
<p><b>When you pick up your gown and marshaling card, your attendance at Convocation is confirmed!</b></p>
<p>You can pick up your gown at the <a href="/maps/sgw-campus.html?building=EV" adhocenable="false">EV Atrium</a>, Engineering and Visual Arts Complex at the following times:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table  ">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th width="222" valign="top"><p><b>Faculty</b></p>
</th>
<th width="222" valign="top"><p><b>Date</b></p>
</th>
<th width="222" valign="top"><p><b>Time</b></p>
</th>
</tr><tr><td width="222" valign="top">Arts &amp; Science</td>
<td width="186" valign="top"><p>November 18, 2013</p>
</td>
<td width="156" valign="top"><p>10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="222" valign="top"><p>Engineering &amp; Computer Science<br>
</p>
</td>
<td width="186" valign="top">November 18, 2013</td>
<td width="156" valign="top"><p>10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td>Fine Arts</td>
<td>November 18, 2013</td>
<td>10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.</td>
</tr><tr><td>John Molson School of Business</td>
<td>November 18, 2013</td>
<td>10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><i>** Please bring your Concordia Student ID card with you!</i></p>
<ul>
<li>Not attending Convocation? <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/graduation/pick-up-replacement-diplomas.html">Here’s how to get your diploma</a>.</li>
<li>Not attending Convocation but would like an official graduation portrait? You must pick up your gown at the times listed above.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="gown-distribution"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open What happens at gown distribution?">
					
                    What happens at gown distribution?
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ol>
<li>We will verify your account balance. If you owe money to the university you may not pick up your gown, attend Convocation or receive your diploma. You will have to pay any outstanding fees before you can pick up your gown. See Student Accounts for acceptable <a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment.html" adhocenable="false">methods of payment</a>.</li>
<li>We will verify your graduation approval. If the <b>Degree Conferred</b> message does not appear on your transcript, you will not be able to pick up your gown or attend Convocation.</li>
<li>We will give you<b> </b>your personal marshaling card and the <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/graduation/dates-and-venues.html">date and time of your ceremony</a>. We use the marshaling card to place students in the correct order at the ceremony.</li>
<li>You will pick up your gown and hood if your degree is a bachelor/baccalaureate, graduate certificate, graduate diploma, or a master/magisteriate.<ul>
<li>If your degree is a doctorate, you will reserve a gown at this time. You will receive your gown at Place des Arts before the ceremony and you will be hooded on stage.</li>
<li>You may borrow a gown for an official graduation photo [link to photos]</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Have an <a adhocenable="false" href="#photos">official photo</a> taken (optional).</li>
</ol>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="unable-to-pick-up-gown"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open What if I'm unable to pick up my gown?">
					
                    What if I'm unable to pick up my gown?
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you can’t attend gown distribution, a friend or family member can pick up your gown and marshaling card on your behalf.&nbsp;</p>
<p>That person must have written authorization from you that includes the following:</p>
<ul>
<li>Your student ID number</li>
<li>The type of degree (e.g., BEng in Mechanical Engineering).</li>
</ul>
<div>That person must also be able to show photo ID so we can ensure that they are the person authorized in your letter.</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>Please check your <a href="/students/graduation/ready-to-graduate.html#approval" adhocenable="false">graduation approval</a> and <a href="/students/graduation/ready-to-graduate.html#account-balance" adhocenable="false">account balance</a> before you send a friend or family member to Concordia.&nbsp;</div>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="return-gown-hood"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open When do I return my gown and hood?">
					
                    When do I return my gown and hood?
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Bring your gown and hood backstage after the ceremony but before you leave Place des Arts.</p>
<p>If you do not return your gown and hood, the gown supplier will bill you for their full value. We will also withhold university transcripts until the gown and hood are returned or their full replacement cost has been paid.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="photos"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Graduation photos">
					
                    Graduation photos
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you’d like to have an official graduation portrait, a photographer will be present at gown distribution.&nbsp; The <a href="http://alumni.concordia.ca/">Concordia University Alumni Association</a>&nbsp;arranges for <a href="http://www.gradimages.com/">GradImages</a> to take photos at during the Convocation ceremonies as well.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/ready-to-graduate.html'>Ready to graduate?</a></li><li class='open'><a class='' href='/students/graduation/convocation.html'>Convocation</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/students/graduation/convocation/gown.html'>Pick up your gown</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/convocation/academic-dress.html'>Academic dress</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/ceremony.html'>Ceremony</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/ceremony/webcast-and-photography.html'>Webcast and photography</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/guest-information.html'>Guest information</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/dates-and-venues.html'>Dates & venues</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/pick-up-replacement-diplomas.html'>Pick-up/mailing of diplomas</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/replacement-diplomas.html'>Replacement diplomas</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/watch_convocation.html'>Graduation & convocation</a></li></ul>
</div>

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Replacement diplomas</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>In the event that your diploma gets lost or destroyed, or if you legally change your name and would like it to appear on your diploma, you may request a replacement. We charge a $75 (CDN) fee for this service.</p>
<p>A replacement diploma is as equally valid and legal as the original diploma, &nbsp;but it is not identical to the original. The replacement diploma includes the phrase,&nbsp;<i>&quot;replaces the original diploma issued to the recipient&quot;</i>. It also includes the date that the replacement diploma was issued as well as the date that the original degree was conferred.</p>
<h2>How to replace a diploma that was lost, destroyed or never picked up</h2>
<ol>
<li>Download and send us a completed&nbsp;<a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/convocation/Replacement.pdf" adhocenable="false">Application For Replacement Degree (PDF)</a>.</li>
<li>Include cheque, money order, bank draft or credit card information with your form.</li>
<li>Download and send us the completed&nbsp;<a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/convocation/Affidavit.pdf" adhocenable="false">Replacement Degree Affidavit (PDF)</a>.<ul>
<li>An affidavit is a legal document, sworn before a Commissioner for Oaths, a Justice of the Peace or a Notary Public. Note that the&nbsp;<a href="/students/birks.html" adhocenable="false">Birks Student Service Centre</a>&nbsp;has Commissioners for Oaths on staff.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>You will be contacted by Enrolment Services once the replacement diploma is ready for pick up. Once notified, you may pick up your diploma at the&nbsp;<a href="/students/birks.html">Birks Student Service Centre</a>&nbsp;or request to have it mailed.<ul>
<li>Note there is an additional fee of $25 (CDN) for mailing.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<h2>How to change your legal name on a replacement diploma</h2>
<ol>
<li>Download&nbsp; the&nbsp;<a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/convocation/Replacement.pdf" adhocenable="false">Application For Replacement Degree (PDF)</a>.</li>
<li>Mail us the completed application form and include:<ul>
<li>Your original diploma</li>
<li>Documentary proof of the change of name (e.g., a copy of your birth certificate)</li>
<li>Payment, either by cheque, money order, bank draft or credit card information<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<p><b>Mailing Address</b></p>
<p>Concordia University<br>
Enrolment Services – Events Office<br>
1455 De Maisonneuve Blvd. West, LB 700<br>
Montreal, Quebec Canada&nbsp; H3G 1M8</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/ready-to-graduate.html'>Ready to graduate?</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/convocation.html'>Convocation</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/convocation/gown.html'>Pick up your gown</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/convocation/academic-dress.html'>Academic dress</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/ceremony.html'>Ceremony</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/ceremony/webcast-and-photography.html'>Webcast and photography</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/guest-information.html'>Guest information</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/dates-and-venues.html'>Dates & venues</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/pick-up-replacement-diplomas.html'>Pick-up/mailing of diplomas</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/students/graduation/replacement-diplomas.html'>Replacement diplomas</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/graduation/watch_convocation.html'>Graduation & convocation</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/graduation/ceremony/webcast-and-photography/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/images/students/convocation/fall-convocation-2013.jpg", imageTitle: "fall\x2Dconvocation\x2D2013" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

	        <div class="parsys content-main">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Academic integrity</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>We at Concordia University value academic integrity. Academic integrity means that every student must be honest and accurate in their work. This means that there are rules and regulations to follow when presenting your work as your own.</p>
<p>Plagiarism—taking someone else's work and presenting it as your own—is one of the most serious forms of academic misconduct.&nbsp;Find out <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/academic-integrity/plagiarism.html">what plagiarism is</a> and how you can avoid it</p>
<p><iframe width="600" height="255" frameborder="0" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/3BeyUy_QyO8">&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;</iframe></p>
<p>Plagiarism is just one form of academic misconduct. Find out about <a href="/students/academic-integrity/misconduct.html" adhocenable="false">other forms of Academic Misconduct</a> and how to avoid them.</p>
<blockquote>&quot;My dog ate my homework!&quot; </blockquote>
<p>People can come up with many reasons why they did something wrong. Find out why <a href="/students/academic-integrity/excuses.html" adhocenable="false">Excuses Won't Work</a>.</p>
<p>Concordia's Academic Code of Conduct sets out the rules for academic integrity at the University. <a href="/students/academic-integrity/code.html" adhocenable="false">Learn more about it</a>.</p>
<p>Plagiarism and other forms of academic misconduct are serious matters. Learn about the <a href="/students/academic-integrity/penalties.html" adhocenable="false">Penalties</a> you could face if you break the rules.</p>
<h4>It's NOT OK to: <i><a href="#butif" adhocenable="false">(But if you do...)</a></i></h4>
<ul>
<li>Copy from ANYWHERE without saying from where it came.</li>
<li>Let another student copy your work and then submit it as his/her own.</li>
<li>Hand in the same assignment in more than one class.</li>
<li>Have unauthorized material in an exam, such as cheat sheets, crib notes. YOU DON'T HAVE TO BE CAUGHT USING THEM - JUST HAVING THEM WILL GET YOU INTO TROUBLE!</li>
<li>Copy from someone else's exam.</li>
<li>Communicate with another student during an exam by talking or using some form of signals.</li>
<li>Add or remove pages from an examination booklet or take the booklet out of an exam room.</li>
<li>Get hold of or steal exam or assignment answers or questions.</li>
<li>Write a test or exam for someone else or have someone write for you.</li>
<li>Hand in false documents such as medical notes, transcript or record.</li>
<li>Falsify data or research results.</li>
</ul>
<h4><a name="butif"></a>But if you do...</h4>
<ul>
<li>The Professor will file an incident report.</li>
<li>You will be asked to come to an interview with the Associate Dean.</li>
<li>A decision will be made to uphold or dismiss the charge.</li>
<li>If the charge is upheld, one or more of the following sanctions will be given:<ul>
<li>A letter of reprimand</li>
<li>Resubmit the assignment or redo the exam</li>
<li>A grade of &quot;0&quot; in the assignment, exam or course</li>
<li>A failing grade in the course with no right to a supplemental exam</li>
<li>Requirement to take up to an additional 24 credits</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>In the case of a second offence, one or more of the following sanctions will also be given in addition to the possible sanctions above:<ul>
<li>Suspension of up to three years</li>
<li>Expulsion from the University</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>A charge of academic misconduct will appear on your student record.</li>
<li>If you believe the charge was incorrectly upheld, you have the right to request a hearing before an Academic Hearing Panel composed of three professors and two students. This is not an appeal but is a complete rehearing of the case.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/academic-integrity/code.html'>Code of Conduct</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/academic-integrity/plagiarism.html'>What is plagiarism?</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/academic-integrity/misconduct.html'>Other forms of misconduct</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/academic-integrity/excuses.html'>Excuses won't work</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/academic-integrity/penalties.html'>Penalties</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">

<script type="text/javascript">
$=jQuery;
$(function() {
    var check = mobilecheck();
    if (!check) {
        $("#feedback-modal").attr("href", "#modal");
        $('a[rel*=leanModal]').leanModal({top: 200, closeButton: ".modal-close"});
    }
});
</script>
</div>


</footer>
    </div>

</body>
</html>
</IIR>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

	        <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="page-header parbase section"> 






<div class="c-intro row">
    <h1 class="span8 section-header">Exams</h1>

    
    <div class="span8">
        <p>Examinations are an important part of university life. Review this section carefully and you'll successfully navigate your way through this academic rite of passage.</p>

    </div>
	<div class="span4">
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/students/exams/important-dates.html">
                    
                    Dates you need to know
                    </a>
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/offices/registrar.html">
                    
                    Contact us
                    </a></div>
</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>Writing your exams</h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt3"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c0 span4"><div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn btn-large btn-block bg-purple" href="/students/exams/schedule.html" target="_self">Exam schedules</a>

</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c1 span4"><div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn btn-large btn-block bg-purple" href="/students/exams/regulations.html" target="_self">Rules and regulations</a>

</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c2 span4"><div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn btn-large btn-block bg-purple" href="/students/exams/conflicts.html" target="_self">Conflicts</a>

</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Special cases</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>What to do if you need special accomodations to write your exams.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt3"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c0 span4"><div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn btn-large btn-block bg-purple" href="/students/exams/accommodations/def-note.html" target="_self">Defer your exam</a>

</div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn btn-large btn-block bg-purple" href="/students/exams/external-exams.html" target="_self">External exams</a>

</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c1 span4"><div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn btn-large btn-block bg-purple" href="/students/exams/accommodations/med-note.html" target="_self">Illness and exams</a>

</div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn btn-large btn-block bg-green" href="/students/exams/examination-office-request-forms.html" target="_self">Request forms</a>

</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c2 span4"><div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn btn-large btn-block bg-purple" href="/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental.html" target="_self">Supplemental exams</a>

</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6 paddingRight rightSeparator "><div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Did you know...</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<div style="padding: 10px 0px; line-height: 36px; font-size: 36px; font-family: GillSansMTPro; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(137, 137, 137); text-align: left;">1,200 exams</div>
<div style="padding: 10px 0px; line-height: 30px; font-size: 30px; font-family: GillSansMTProLight; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-align: left;">scheduled for each fall and winter term</div>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Where to find us</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="tiles section">





<div class="row-fluid">


    <div class="span6" style='margin-left:0px !important;'>
        <div class="parsys tiles_tiles_parsys_0">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><i>Permanent location</i>:</p>
<p><b>Examinations Office</b><br>
Concordia University<br>
<a href="/maps/sgw-campus.html?building=GM" adhocenable="false">GM-210.00</a><br>
<a href="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=1550+Boulevard+de+Maisonneuve+Ouest,+Montr%C3%A9al,+Communaut%C3%A9-Urbaine-de-Montr%C3%A9al,+Qu%C3%A9bec+H3G+2E9,+Canada&amp;hl=en&amp;ie=UTF8&amp;sll=45.497511,-73.578143&amp;sspn=0.005941,0.012295&amp;hnear=1550+Boulevard+de+Maisonneuve+Ouest,+Montr%C3%A9al,+Communaut%C3%A9-Urbaine-de-Montr%C3%A9al,+Qu%C3%A9bec+H3H+2M8,+Canada&amp;t=m&amp;z=16" adhocenable="false">1550 De Maisonneuve Blvd. West</a><br>
</p>

</div></div>


</div>

    </div>
    
    <div class="span6" >
        <div class="parsys tiles_tiles_parsys_1">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><i>Temporary location during final exam periods (April &amp; December)</i>:</p>
<p><b>Examinations Office</b><br>
Concordia University<br>
Room&nbsp;<a href="/maps/sgw-campus.html?building=H" adhocenable="false">H-439</a>&nbsp;or <a href="/maps/sgw-campus.html?building=MB" adhocenable="false">MB-S2.445</a>&nbsp;<br>
<a href="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=1550+Boulevard+de+Maisonneuve+Ouest,+Montr%C3%A9al,+Communaut%C3%A9-Urbaine-de-Montr%C3%A9al,+Qu%C3%A9bec+H3G+2E9,+Canada&amp;hl=en&amp;ie=UTF8&amp;sll=45.497511,-73.578143&amp;sspn=0.005941,0.012295&amp;hnear=1550+Boulevard+de+Maisonneuve+Ouest,+Montr%C3%A9al,+Communaut%C3%A9-Urbaine-de-Montr%C3%A9al,+Qu%C3%A9bec+H3H+2M8,+Canada&amp;t=m&amp;z=16" adhocenable="false">1455 De Maisonneuve Blvd. West</a></p>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

                    Home
                </a>
